ai-an5:1.1.2_0: At one time the Buddha was staying near Sāvatthī in Jeta’s Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s monastery.
ai-an5:1.2.1_0: “Mendicants, there are these five powers of a trainee.
ai-an5:1.2.3_0: The powers of faith, conscience, prudence, energy, and wisdom.
ai-an5:1.2.4_0: These are the five powers of a trainee.
ai-an5:1.3.1_0: So you should train like this:
ai-an5:1.3.2_0: ‘We will have the trainee’s powers of faith, conscience, prudence, energy, and wisdom.’
ai-an5:1.3.4_0: That is what the Buddha said.
ai-an5:1.3.5_0: Satisfied, the mendicants were happy with what the Buddha said.
ai-an5:2.1.1_0: “Mendicants, there are these five powers of a trainee.
ai-an5:2.1.3_0: The powers of faith, conscience, prudence, energy, and wisdom.
ai-an5:2.2.1_0: And what is the power of faith?
ai-an5:2.2.2_0: It’s when a noble disciple has faith in the Realized One’s awakening ...
ai-an5:2.2.3_0: ‘That Blessed One is perfected, a fully awakened Buddha, accomplished in knowledge and conduct, holy, knower of the world, supreme guide for those who wish to train, teacher of gods and humans, awakened, blessed.’
ai-an5:2.2.4_0: This is called the power of faith.
ai-an5:2.3.1_0: And what is the power of conscience?
ai-an5:2.3.2_0: It’s when a noble disciple has a conscience. They’re conscientious about bad conduct by way of body, speech, and mind, and conscientious about having any bad, unskillful qualities.
ai-an5:2.3.3_0: This is called the power of conscience.
ai-an5:2.4.1_0: And what is the power of prudence?
ai-an5:2.4.2_0: It’s when a noble disciple is prudent. They’re prudent when it comes to bad conduct by way of body, speech, and mind, and prudent when it comes to the acquiring of any bad, unskillful qualities.
ai-an5:2.4.3_0: This is called the power of prudence.
ai-an5:2.5.1_0: And what is the power of energy?
ai-an5:2.5.2_0: It’s when a mendicant lives with energy roused up for giving up unskillful qualities and embracing skillful qualities. They’re strong, staunchly vigorous, not slacking off when it comes to developing skillful qualities.
ai-an5:2.5.3_0: This is called the power of energy.
ai-an5:2.6.1_0: And what is the power of wisdom?
ai-an5:2.6.2_0: It’s when a noble disciple is wise. They have the wisdom of arising and passing away which is noble, penetrative, and leads to the complete ending of suffering.
ai-an5:2.6.3_0: This is called the power of wisdom.
ai-an5:2.6.4_0: These are the five powers of a trainee.
ai-an5:2.7.1_0: So you should train like this:
ai-an5:2.7.2_0: ‘We will have the trainee’s powers of faith, conscience, prudence, energy, and wisdom.
ai-an5:2.7.2_3: we will have the power of wisdom.’
ai-an5:3.1.1_0: “Mendicants, when a mendicant has five qualities they live unhappily in the present life—with distress, anguish, and fever—and when the body breaks up, after death, they can expect a bad rebirth.
ai-an5:3.1.3_0: It’s when a mendicant is faithless, shameless, imprudent, lazy, and witless.
ai-an5:3.1.4_0: When a mendicant has these five qualities they live unhappily in the present life—with distress, anguish, and fever—and when the body breaks up, after death, they can expect a bad rebirth.
ai-an5:3.2.1_0: When a mendicant has five qualities they live happily in the present life—without distress, anguish, or fever—and when the body breaks up, after death, they can expect a good rebirth.
ai-an5:3.2.3_0: It’s when a mendicant is faithful, conscientious, prudent, energetic, and wise.
ai-an5:3.2.4_0: When a mendicant has these five qualities they live happily in the present life—without distress, anguish, or fever—and when the body breaks up, after death, they can expect a good rebirth.”
ai-an5:4.1.1_0: “Mendicants, a monk with five qualities is cast down to hell.
ai-an5:4.1.3_0: It’s when a mendicant is faithless, shameless, imprudent, lazy, and witless.
ai-an5:4.1.4_0: A mendicant with these five qualities is cast down to hell.
ai-an5:4.2.1_0: A mendicant with five qualities is raised up to heaven.
ai-an5:4.2.3_0: It’s when a mendicant is faithful, conscientious, prudent, energetic, and wise.
ai-an5:4.2.4_0: A mendicant with these five qualities is raised up to heaven.”
ai-an5:5.1.1_0: “Mendicants, any monk or nun who resigns the training and returns to a lesser life deserves rebuke and criticism on five legitimate grounds in the present life.
ai-an5:5.1.3_0: ‘You have no faith, conscience, prudence, energy, or wisdom when it comes to skillful qualities.’
ai-an5:5.1.4_0: Any monk or nun who resigns the training and returns to a lesser life deserves rebuke and criticism on these five legitimate grounds in the present life.
ai-an5:5.2.1_0: Any monk or nun who lives the full and pure spiritual life in pain and sadness, weeping, with tearful face, deserves praise on five legitimate grounds in the present life.
ai-an5:5.2.3_0: ‘You had faith, conscience, prudence, energy, and wisdom regarding skillful qualities.’
ai-an5:5.2.4_0: Any monk or nun who lives the full and pure spiritual life in pain and sadness, weeping, with tearful face, deserves praise on these five legitimate grounds in the present life.”
ai-an5:6.1.1_0: “Mendicants, you don’t become unskillful as long as faith is established in skillful qualities.
ai-an5:6.1.2_0: But when faith vanishes and faithlessness takes over,
ai-an5:6.2.1_0: You don’t become unskillful as long as conscience ... prudence ... energy ... wisdom is established in skillful qualities.
ai-an5:6.2.2_0: But when the night has vanished,
ai-an5:6.3.1_0: You don’t become unskillful as long as conscience ... prudence ... energy ... wisdom is established in skillful qualities.
ai-an5:6.3.2_0: But whenever you’re prudent and prudent,
ai-an5:6.4.1_0: You don’t become unskillful as long as energy is established in skillful qualities.
ai-an5:6.4.2_0: But when the energy is roused up and laziness,
ai-an5:6.5.1_0: You don’t become unskillful as long as wisdom is established in skillful qualities.
ai-an5:6.5.2_0: But when wisdom vanishes and witlessness takes over,
ai-an5:6.5.4_0: The sixth offering to an individual.
ai-an5:7.1.1_0: “Mendicants, sentient beings are mostly charmed by sensual pleasures.
ai-an5:7.1.2_0: When a gentleman has abandoned the scythe and flail and gone forth from the lay life to homelessness, they’re qualified to be called ‘a faithful renunciate from a good family’.
ai-an5:7.1.4_0: Because a youth can get sensual pleasures of this kind or that.
ai-an5:7.1.5_0: Those who are inferior and superior sense desires—their sense desires, middle, and sublime—are considered all kinds of sensual pleasures.
ai-an5:7.1.6_0: Suppose there was a little baby boy who, because of his nurse’s negligence, puts a stick or stone in his mouth.
ai-an5:7.1.7_0: The nurse would very quickly notice
ai-an5:7.1.8_0: and try to take it out.
ai-an5:7.1.9_0: If that didn’t work, she’d cradle his head with her left hand, and take it out using a hooked finger of her right hand, even if it drew blood.
ai-an5:7.1.11_0: I admit she’d know, ‘This will distress the child,
ai-an5:7.1.13_0: But this is how you should practice out of compassion.
ai-an5:7.1.14_0: When that boy was carried off, there’s no other currents.
ai-an5:7.1.15_0: ‘The boy can look after himself. He won’t be negligent.’
ai-an5:7.2.1_0: In the same way, I still need to look after a mendicant who hasn’t finished developing faith, conscience, prudence, energy, and wisdom regarding skillful qualities.
ai-an5:7.2.2_0: When a mendicant has done these things,
ai-an5:7.2.3_0: ‘They can look after themselves. They won’t be negligent.’”
ai-an5:8.1.1_0: “Mendicants, a mendicant with five qualities fails, and doesn’t establish themselves in the true teaching.
ai-an5:8.1.6_0: A lazy mendicant doesn’t establish themselves in the true teaching.
ai-an5:8.1.7_0: witless fails, and doesn’t establish themselves in the true teaching.
ai-an5:8.1.8_0: A mendicant with these five qualities fails, and doesn’t establish themselves in the true teaching.
ai-an5:8.2.1_0: A mendicant with five qualities doesn’t fail, and establishes themselves in the true teaching.
ai-an5:8.2.7_0: wise doesn’t fail, and establishes themselves in the true teaching.
ai-an5:8.2.8_0: A mendicant with these five qualities doesn’t fail, and establishes themselves in the true teaching.”
ai-an5:9.1.1_0: “Mendicants, a disrespectful and irreverent mendicant with five qualities fails, and doesn’t establish themselves in the true teaching.
ai-an5:9.1.3_0: A disrespectful and irreverent mendicant who is faithless ...
ai-an5:9.1.6_0: A disrespectful and lazy mendicant fails, and doesn’t establish themselves in the true teaching.
ai-an5:9.1.7_0: witless fails, and doesn’t establish themselves in the true teaching.
ai-an5:9.1.8_0: A disrespectful and irreverent mendicant with these five qualities fails, and doesn’t establish themselves in the true teaching.
ai-an5:9.2.1_0: A respectful and reverent mendicant with five qualities doesn’t fail, and establishes themselves in the true teaching.
ai-an5:9.2.3_0: A respectful and reverent mendicant who is faithful ...
ai-an5:9.2.7_0: wise doesn’t fail, and establishes themselves in the true teaching.
ai-an5:9.2.8_0: A respectful and reverent mendicant with these five qualities doesn’t fail, and establishes themselves in the true teaching.”
ai-an5:10.1.1_0: “Mendicants, a disrespectful and irreverent mendicant with five qualities can’t achieve growth, improvement, or maturity in this teaching and training.
ai-an5:10.1.3_0: A disrespectful and irreverent mendicant who is faithless ...
ai-an5:10.1.6_0: A disrespectful and lazy mendicant who is lazy ...
ai-an5:10.1.7_0: witless person can’t achieve growth, improvement, or maturity in this teaching and training.
ai-an5:10.1.8_0: A disrespectful and irreverent mendicant with these five qualities can’t achieve growth, improvement, or maturity in this teaching and training.
ai-an5:10.2.1_0: A respectful and reverent mendicant with five qualities can achieve growth, improvement, and maturity in this teaching and training.
ai-an5:10.2.3_0: A respectful and reverent mendicant who is faithful ...
ai-an5:10.2.5_0: A respectful and reverent mendicant with these five qualities can achieve growth, improvement, and maturity in this teaching and training.”
ai-an5:10.2.7_0: The first sub-chapter on trainees is finished.

ai-an5:11.1.1_0: “I claim to have attained perfection and consummation of insight regarding principles not learned before from another.
ai-an5:11.1.2_0: The Realized One has five powers of a Realized One. With these he claims the bull’s place, roars his lion’s roar in the assemblies, and turns the holy wheel.
ai-an5:11.1.4_0: The powers of faith, conscience, prudence, energy, and wisdom.
ai-an5:11.1.5_0: These are the five powers of a Realized One. With these he claims the bull’s place, roars his lion’s roar in the assemblies, and turns the holy wheel.”
ai-an5:12.1.1_0: “Mendicants, there are these five powers of a trainee.
ai-an5:12.1.3_0: The powers of faith, conscience, prudence, energy, and wisdom.
ai-an5:12.1.4_0: These are the five powers of a trainee.
ai-an5:12.1.5_0: Of these five powers of a trainee, the power of wisdom is the chief. It holds and binds everything together.
ai-an5:12.2.1_0: It’s like a bungalow. The roof-peak is the chief point, which holds and binds everything together.
ai-an5:12.2.2_0: In the same way, of these five powers of a trainee, the power of wisdom is the chief. It holds and binds everything together.
ai-an5:12.3.1_0: So you should train like this:
ai-an5:12.3.2_0: ‘We will have the trainee’s powers of faith, conscience, prudence, energy, and wisdom.
ai-an5:12.3.2_3: we will have the power of wisdom.’
ai-an5:13.1.3_0: The powers of faith, energy, mindfulness, immersion, and wisdom.
ai-an5:14.1.3_0: The powers of faith, energy, mindfulness, immersion, and wisdom.
ai-an5:14.2.1_0: And what is the power of faith?
ai-an5:14.2.2_0: It’s when a noble disciple has faith in the Realized One’s awakening ...
ai-an5:14.2.3_0: ‘That Blessed One is perfected, a fully awakened Buddha, accomplished in knowledge and conduct, holy, knower of the world, supreme guide for those who wish to train, teacher of gods and humans, awakened, blessed.’
ai-an5:14.2.4_0: This is called the power of faith.
ai-an5:14.3.1_0: And what is the power of energy?
ai-an5:14.3.2_0: It’s when a mendicant lives with energy roused up for giving up unskillful qualities and embracing skillful qualities. They’re strong, staunchly vigorous, not slacking off when it comes to developing skillful qualities.
ai-an5:14.3.3_0: This is called the power of energy.
ai-an5:14.4.1_0: And what is the power of mindfulness?
ai-an5:14.4.2_0: It’s when a noble disciple is mindful. They have utmost mindfulness and alertness, and can remember and recall what was said and done long ago.
ai-an5:14.4.3_0: This is called the power of mindfulness.
ai-an5:14.5.1_0: And what is the power of immersion?
ai-an5:14.5.2_0: It’s when a mendicant, quite secluded from sensual pleasures, secluded from unskillful qualities, enters and remains in the first absorption, which has the rapture and bliss born of seclusion, while placing the mind and keeping it connected.
ai-an5:14.5.3_0: As the placing of the mind and keeping it connected are stilled, they enter and remain in the second absorption ...
ai-an5:14.5.4_0: And with the fading away of rapture, they enter and remain in the third absorption, where they meditate with equanimity, mindful and aware, personally experiencing the bliss of which the noble ones declare, ‘Equanimous and mindful, one meditates in bliss.’
ai-an5:14.5.4_1: ‘One is even-minded, mindful, and abides in bliss.’
ai-an5:14.5.5_0: Giving up pleasure and pain, and ending former happiness and sadness, they enter and remain in the fourth absorption, without pleasure or pain, with pure equanimity and mindfulness.
ai-an5:14.5.6_0: This is called the power of immersion.
ai-an5:14.6.1_0: And what is the power of wisdom?
ai-an5:14.6.2_0: It’s when a noble disciple is wise. They have the wisdom of arising and passing away which is noble, penetrative, and leads to the complete ending of suffering.
ai-an5:14.6.3_0: This is called the power of wisdom.
ai-an5:15.1.3_0: The powers of faith, energy, mindfulness, immersion, and wisdom.
ai-an5:15.1.4_0: And where should the power of faith be seen?
ai-an5:15.1.5_0: In the four factors of stream-entry.
ai-an5:15.1.6_0: One should see the power of faith should be seen.
ai-an5:15.1.7_0: And where should the power of energy be seen?
ai-an5:15.1.9_0: that’s the power of energy should be seen.
ai-an5:15.1.10_0: And where should the power of mindfulness be seen?
ai-an5:15.1.11_0: In the four kinds of mindfulness meditation.
ai-an5:15.1.12_0: You should see the power of mindfulness there.
ai-an5:15.1.13_0: And where should the power of immersion be seen?
ai-an5:15.1.15_0: You should see the power of immersion in this case.
ai-an5:15.1.16_0: And where should the power of wisdom be seen?
ai-an5:15.1.18_0: You should see the power of wisdom.
ai-an5:16.1.3_0: The powers of faith, energy, mindfulness, immersion, and wisdom.
ai-an5:16.1.5_0: Of these five powers, the power of wisdom is the chief. It holds and binds everything together.
ai-an5:16.1.6_0: It’s like a bungalow. The roof-peak is the chief point, which holds and binds everything together.
ai-an5:16.1.7_0: In the same way, of these five powers, the power of wisdom is the chief. It holds and binds everything together.”
ai-an5:16.1.8_0: The sixth offering to an individual.
ai-an5:17.1.1_0: “Mendicants, a mendicant with five qualities is practicing for their own welfare, but not that of others.
ai-an5:17.1.3_0: It’s when a mendicant is personally accomplished in ethics, immersion, wisdom, freedom, and the knowledge and vision of freedom. But they don’t encourage others in these qualities.
ai-an5:17.1.4_0: They’re accomplished in immersion, but don’t encourage others to do the same.
ai-an5:17.1.5_0: They’re accomplished in wisdom, but don’t encourage others to do the same.
ai-an5:17.1.6_0: They’re accomplished in freedom, but don’t encourage others to do the same.
ai-an5:17.1.7_0: They’re accomplished in the knowledge and vision of freedom, but don’t encourage others to do the same.
ai-an5:17.1.8_0: A mendicant with these five qualities is practicing for their own welfare, but not that of others.”
ai-an5:18.1.1_0: “Mendicants, a mendicant with five qualities is practicing for the welfare of others, but not their own.
ai-an5:18.1.3_0: It’s when a mendicant is not personally accomplished in ethics, immersion, wisdom, freedom, or the knowledge and vision of freedom. But they encourage others in these qualities.
ai-an5:18.1.4_0: They’re not accomplished in immersion. They encourage others to do the same.
ai-an5:18.1.5_0: They’re not accomplished in wisdom. They encourage others to do the same.
ai-an5:18.1.6_0: They’re not accomplished in freedom, but encourage others to do the same.
ai-an5:18.1.7_0: They’re not accomplished in the knowledge and vision of freedom, but encourage others to do the same.
ai-an5:18.1.8_0: A mendicant with these five qualities is practicing for the welfare of others, but not their own.”
ai-an5:19.1.1_0: “Mendicants, a mendicant with five qualities is practicing neither for their own welfare, nor that of others.
ai-an5:19.1.3_0: It’s when a mendicant is not personally accomplished in ethics, immersion, wisdom, freedom, or the knowledge and vision of freedom. Nor do they encourage others in these qualities.
ai-an5:19.1.4_0: They’re not accomplished in immersion, but don’t encourage others to do the same.
ai-an5:19.1.5_0: They’re not accomplished in wisdom, but don’t encourage others to do the same.
ai-an5:19.1.6_0: They’re not accomplished in freedom, but don’t encourage others to do the same.
ai-an5:19.1.7_0: They’re not accomplished in the knowledge and vision of freedom, but don’t encourage others to do the same.
ai-an5:19.1.8_0: A mendicant with these five qualities is practicing neither for their own welfare, nor that of others.”
ai-an5:20.1.1_0: “Mendicants, a mendicant with five qualities is practicing for both their own welfare and that of others.
ai-an5:20.1.3_0: It’s when a mendicant is personally accomplished in ethics, immersion, and wisdom. And they encourage others in these qualities.
ai-an5:20.1.4_0: They’re accomplished in immersion, and they encourage others to do the same.
ai-an5:20.1.5_0: They’re accomplished in freedom, and they encourage others to do the same.
ai-an5:20.1.6_0: They’re accomplished in the knowledge and vision of freedom, and they encourage others to do the same.
ai-an5:20.1.7_0: A mendicant with these five qualities is practicing both for their own welfare and that of others.”

ai-an5:21.2.5_0: Having fulfilled right view, it’s possible to fulfill right immersion.”

ai-an5:23.1.1_0: “Mendicants, these five corruptions of gold. When silver is corrupted by these it’s not pliable, workable, or radiant. It’s not brittle, and not completely ready for working.
ai-an5:23.1.3_0: Iron, copper, tin, lead, and silver.
ai-an5:23.1.4_0: These five corruptions of gold is not pliable, workable, or radiant. They’re not brittle, and not completely ready for working.
ai-an5:23.1.5_0: But when these five corruptions were created, tribulated, and broken, not brittle, and ready to be worked.
ai-an5:23.1.6_0: Then the goldsmith can successfully create any kind of ornament they want, whether a bracelet, earrings, a necklace, or a golden garland.
ai-an5:23.2.1_0: In the same way, there are these five corruptions of the mind. When the mind is corrupted by these it’s not pliable, workable, or radiant. It’s brittle, and not completely immersed in samādhi for the ending of defilements.
ai-an5:23.2.3_0: Sensual desire, ill will, dullness and drowsiness, restlessness and remorse, and doubt.
ai-an5:23.2.4_0: These are the five corruptions of the mind. When the mind is corrupted by these it’s not pliable, workable, or radiant. It’s brittle, and not completely immersed in samādhi for the ending of defilements.
ai-an5:23.2.5_0: But when their mind is freed from these five corruptions, pliable, workable, and radiant, not brittle, and is completely immersed in samādhi for the ending of defilements.
ai-an5:23.2.6_0: They become capable of realizing anything that can be realized by insight to which they extend the mind, in each and every case.
ai-an5:23.3.1_1: ‘May I wield the many kinds of psychic power: multiplying myself and becoming one again ...

ai-an5:23.3.1_4: They could make up out of the earth, like the water in the sky.
ai-an5:23.3.1_5: As a consequence he might gain the earth.
ai-an5:23.3.1_6: And all the air that can be couch crossed over the wound.
ai-an5:23.3.1_7: even the moon and sun, so mighty and powerful, controlling the body as far as the Brahmā realm.’
ai-an5:23.3.2_0: They’re capable of realizing it, in each and every case.
ai-an5:23.4.1_1: ‘With clairaudience that is purified and superhuman, may I hear both kinds of sounds, human and divine, whether near or far.’
ai-an5:23.4.2_0: They’re capable of realizing it, in each and every case.
