ai-an5:79.3.7_0: They too will not develop their physical endurance, ethics, mind, and wisdom.
ai-an5:79.3.8_0: And that is how corrupt training comes from corrupt teachings,
ai-an5:79.3.9_0: and corrupt teachings come from corrupt training.
ai-an5:79.3.10_0: This is the second future peril that has not currently arisen, but will arise in the future ...
ai-an5:79.3.11_0: You should look out for them
ai-an5:79.3.12_0: and try to give them up.
ai-an5:79.4.1_0: Furthermore, in a future time there will be mendicants who have not developed their physical endurance, ethics, mind, and wisdom.
ai-an5:79.4.2_0: When they’ve developed their physical endurance, ethics, mind, and wisdom, they won’t get rid of it.
ai-an5:79.4.3_0: And that is how corrupt training comes from corrupt teachings,
ai-an5:79.4.4_0: and corrupt teachings come from corrupt training.
ai-an5:79.4.5_0: This is the third future peril that has not currently arisen, but will arise in the future ...
ai-an5:79.4.6_0: You should look out for them
ai-an5:79.4.7_0: and try to give them up.
ai-an5:79.5.1_0: Furthermore, in a future time there will be mendicants who have not developed their physical endurance, ethics, mind, and wisdom.
ai-an5:79.5.2_0: When discourses spoken by the Realized One—deep, profound, transcendent, dealing with emptiness—are being recited they won’t want to listen. They won’t pay attention or apply their minds to understand them, nor will they think those teachings are worth learning and memorizing.
ai-an5:79.5.3_0: But when discourses composed by poets—poetry, with fancy words and phrases, composed by outsiders or spoken by disciples—are being recited they will want to listen. They’ll pay attention and apply their minds to understand them, and they’ll think those teachings are worth learning and memorizing.
ai-an5:79.5.4_0: And that is how corrupt training comes from corrupt teachings,
ai-an5:79.5.5_0: and corrupt teachings come from corrupt training.
ai-an5:79.5.6_0: This is the fourth future peril that has not currently arisen, but will arise in the future ...
ai-an5:79.5.7_0: You should look out for them
ai-an5:79.5.8_0: and try to give them up.
ai-an5:79.6.1_0: Furthermore, in a future time there will be mendicants who have not developed their physical endurance, ethics, mind, and wisdom.
ai-an5:79.6.2_0: The senior mendicants will be indulgent and slack, leaders in backsliding, neglecting seclusion, not rousing energy for attaining the unattained, achieving the unachieved, and realizing the unrealized.
ai-an5:79.6.3_0: Those who come after them will follow their example.
ai-an5:79.6.4_0: They too will become indulgent and slack, leaders in backsliding, neglecting seclusion, not rousing energy for attaining the unattained, achieving the unachieved, and realizing the unrealized.
ai-an5:79.6.5_0: And that is how corrupt training comes from corrupt teachings,
ai-an5:79.6.6_0: and corrupt teachings come from corrupt training.
ai-an5:79.6.7_0: This is the fifth future peril that has not currently arisen, but will arise in the future ...
ai-an5:79.6.8_0: You should look out for them
ai-an5:79.6.9_0: and try to give them up.
ai-an5:79.7.1_0: These are the five future perils that have not currently arisen, but will arise in the future.
ai-an5:79.7.2_0: You should look out for them
ai-an5:79.7.3_0: and try to give them up.”
ai-an5:80.1.1_0: “Mendicants, these five future perils have not currently arisen, but they will arise in the future.
ai-an5:80.1.2_0: You should look out for them
ai-an5:80.1.3_0: and try to give them up.
ai-an5:80.2.2_0: In a future time there will be mendicants who like nice robes.
ai-an5:80.2.3_0: They will neglect the practice of wearing rag robes and the practice of frequenting remote lodgings in the wilderness and the forest.
ai-an5:80.2.4_0: They will come down to the villages, towns, and capital cities and make their homes there. And they will try to get robes in many kinds of wrong and inappropriate ways.
ai-an5:80.2.5_0: This is the first future peril that has not currently arisen, but will arise in the future ...
ai-an5:80.2.6_0: You should look out for them
ai-an5:80.2.7_0: and try to give them up.
ai-an5:80.3.1_0: Furthermore, in a future time there will be mendicants who like nice alms-food.
ai-an5:80.3.2_0: They will neglect the practice of walking for alms-food and the practice of frequenting remote lodgings in the wilderness and the forest.
ai-an5:80.3.3_0: They will come down to the villages, towns, and capital cities and make their homes there. And they will try to get alms-food in many kinds of wrong and inappropriate ways.
ai-an5:80.3.4_0: This is the second future peril that has not currently arisen, but will arise in the future ...
ai-an5:80.3.5_0: You should look out for them
ai-an5:80.3.6_0: and try to give them up.
ai-an5:80.4.1_0: Furthermore, in a future time there will be mendicants who like nice lodgings.
ai-an5:80.4.2_0: They will neglect the practice of staying at the root of a tree and the practice of frequenting remote lodgings in the wilderness and the forest.
ai-an5:80.4.3_0: They will come down to the villages, towns, and capital cities and make their homes there. And they will try to get lodgings in many kinds of wrong and inappropriate ways.
ai-an5:80.4.4_0: This is the third future peril that has not currently arisen, but will arise in the future ...
ai-an5:80.4.5_0: You should look out for them
ai-an5:80.4.6_0: and try to give them up.
ai-an5:80.5.1_0: Furthermore, in a future time there will be mendicants who mix closely with nuns, trainee nuns, and novice nuns.
ai-an5:80.5.2_0: In such conditions, it can be expected that
ai-an5:80.5.3_0: they will lead the spiritual life dissatisfied, or commit one of the corrupt offenses, or resign the training and return to a lesser life.
ai-an5:80.5.4_0: This is the fourth future peril that has not currently arisen, but will arise in the future ...
ai-an5:80.5.5_0: You should look out for them
ai-an5:80.5.6_0: and try to give them up.
ai-an5:80.6.1_0: Furthermore, in a future time there will be mendicants who mix closely with monastery attendants and novices.
ai-an5:80.6.2_0: In such conditions it can be expected that
ai-an5:80.6.3_0: they will engage in storing up goods for their own use, and making obvious hints about digging the earth and cutting plants.
ai-an5:80.6.4_0: This is the fifth future peril that has not currently arisen, but will arise in the future ...
ai-an5:80.6.5_0: You should look out for them
ai-an5:80.6.6_0: and try to give them up.
ai-an5:80.7.1_0: These are the five future perils that have not currently arisen, but will arise in the future.
ai-an5:80.7.2_0: You should look out for them
ai-an5:80.7.3_0: and try to give them up.”
ai-an5:80.7.5_0: The third sub-chapter on livelihood is finished.
ai-an5:80.8.1_0: They lack the fruit of freedom of heart.
ai-an5:80.8.2_0: There are two who live in Dhamma,
ai-an5:81.1.1_0: “Mendicants, a senior mendicant with five qualities is unlikable and unlovable to their spiritual companions, not respected or admired.
ai-an5:81.1.3_0: They desire the desirable, they hate the hateful, they’re deluded by the delusory, they’re annoyed by the annoying, and they’re intoxicated by the intoxicating.
ai-an5:81.1.4_0: A senior mendicant with these five qualities is unlikable and unlovable to their spiritual companions, not respected or admired.
ai-an5:81.2.1_0: A senior mendicant with five qualities is dear and beloved to their spiritual companions, respected and admired.
ai-an5:81.2.3_0: They don’t desire the desirable, they don’t hate the hateful, they’re not deluded by the delusory, they’re not annoyed by the annoying, and they’re not intoxicated by the intoxicating.
ai-an5:81.2.4_0: A senior mendicant with these five qualities is dear and beloved to their spiritual companions, respected and admired.”
ai-an5:82.1.1_0: “Mendicants, a senior mendicant with five qualities is unlikable and unlovable to their spiritual companions, not respected or admired.
ai-an5:82.1.3_0: They’re not free of greed, hate, and delusion; they’re not offensive and contemptuous.
ai-an5:82.1.4_0: A senior mendicant with these five qualities is unlikable and unlovable to their spiritual companions, not respected or admired.
ai-an5:82.2.1_0: A senior mendicant with five qualities is dear and beloved to their spiritual companions, respected and admired.
ai-an5:82.2.3_0: They’re free of greed, hate, and delusion; they’re not offensive and contemptuous.
ai-an5:82.2.4_0: A senior mendicant with these five qualities is dear and beloved to their spiritual companions, respected and admired.”
ai-an5:83.1.1_0: “Mendicants, a senior mendicant with five qualities is unlikable and unlovable to their spiritual companions, not respected or admired.
ai-an5:83.1.4_0: A senior mendicant with these five qualities is unlikable and unlovable to their spiritual companions, not respected or admired.
ai-an5:83.2.1_0: A senior mendicant with five qualities is dear and beloved to their spiritual companions, respected and admired.
ai-an5:83.2.3_0: They’re not angry and upset. They don’t get material possessions and honor. They don’t come to them.
ai-an5:83.2.4_0: A senior mendicant with these five qualities is dear and beloved to their spiritual companions, respected and admired.”
ai-an5:84.1.1_0: “Mendicants, a senior mendicant with five qualities is unlikable and unlovable to their spiritual companions, not respected or admired.
ai-an5:84.1.3_0: They’re faithless, shameless, imprudent, lazy, and witless.
ai-an5:84.1.4_0: A senior mendicant with these five qualities is unlikable and unlovable to their spiritual companions, not respected or admired.
ai-an5:84.2.1_0: A senior mendicant with five qualities is dear and beloved to their spiritual companions, respected and admired.
ai-an5:84.2.3_0: They’re faithful, conscientious, prudent, energetic, and wise.
ai-an5:84.2.4_0: A senior mendicant with these five qualities is dear and beloved to their spiritual companions, respected and admired.”
ai-an5:85.1.1_0: “Mendicants, a senior mendicant with five qualities is unlikable and unlovable to their spiritual companions, not respected or admired.
ai-an5:85.1.3_0: They can’t endure sights, sounds, smells, tastes, and touches.
ai-an5:85.1.4_0: A senior mendicant with these five qualities is unlikable and unlovable to their spiritual companions, not respected or admired.
ai-an5:85.2.1_0: A senior mendicant with five qualities is dear and beloved to their spiritual companions, respected and admired.
ai-an5:85.2.3_0: He can endure sights, sounds, smells, tastes, and touches.
ai-an5:85.2.4_0: A senior mendicant with these five qualities is dear and beloved to their spiritual companions, respected and admired.”
ai-an5:86.1.1_0: “A senior mendicant with five qualities is dear and beloved to their spiritual companions, respected and admired.
ai-an5:86.1.3_0: They have attained the textual analysis of meaning, text, terminology, and eloquence.
ai-an5:86.1.4_0: And they are skilled and tireless in a diverse spectrum of duties for their spiritual companions, understanding how to go about things in order to complete and organize the work.
ai-an5:86.1.5_0: A senior mendicant with these five qualities is dear and beloved to their spiritual companions, respected and admired.”
ai-an5:86.1.6_0: The sixth offering to an individual.
ai-an5:87.1.1_0: “A senior mendicant with five qualities is dear and beloved to their spiritual companions, respected and admired.
ai-an5:87.1.3_0: They’re ethical, restrained in the monastic code, conducting themselves well and seeking alms in suitable places.
ai-an5:87.1.3_1: Seeing danger in the slightest fault, they keep the rules they’ve undertaken.
ai-an5:87.1.4_0: They’re very learned, remembering and keeping what they’ve learned. These teachings are good in the beginning, good in the middle, and good in the end, meaningful and well-phrased, describing a spiritual practice that’s entirely full and pure. They are very learned in such teachings, remembering them, reinforcing them by recitation, mentally scrutinizing them, and comprehending them theoretically.
ai-an5:87.1.5_0: They’re a good speaker. Their voice is polished, clear, articulate, and expresses the meaning.
ai-an5:87.1.6_0: they get the four absorptions—blissful meditations in the present life that belong to the higher mind—when they want, without trouble or difficulty.
ai-an5:87.1.7_0: They realize the undefiled freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom in this very life. And they live having realized it with their own insight due to the ending of defilements.
ai-an5:87.1.8_0: A senior mendicant with these five qualities is dear and beloved to their spiritual companions, respected and admired.”
ai-an5:88.1.1_0: “Mendicants, a senior mendicant who has five qualities is acting for the hurt and unhappiness of the people, for the harm, hurt, and suffering of gods and humans.
ai-an5:88.2.2_0: They are senior and have long gone forth.
ai-an5:88.2.3_0: They’re well-known, famous, with a large following that includes both laypeople and renunciates.
ai-an5:88.2.4_0: They receive robes, alms-food, lodgings, and medicines and supplies for the sick.
ai-an5:88.2.5_0: They’re very learned, remembering and keeping what they’ve learned. These teachings are good in the beginning, good in the middle, and good in the end, meaningful and well-phrased, describing a spiritual practice that’s entirely full and pure. They are very learned in such teachings, remembering them, reinforcing them by recitation, mentally scrutinizing them, and comprehending them theoretically.
ai-an5:88.2.6_0: But they have wrong view and distorted perspective. They draw many people away from the true teaching and establish them in false teachings.
ai-an5:88.2.7_0: People follow their example, thinking that the senior mendicant is senior and has long gone forth. Or that they’re well-known, famous, with a large following that includes both laypeople and renunciates. Or that they receive robes, alms-food, lodgings, and medicines and supplies for the sick. Or that they’re very learned, remembering and keeping what they’ve learned.
ai-an5:88.2.8_0: A senior mendicant who has these five qualities is acting for the hurt and unhappiness of the people, for the harm, hurt, and suffering of gods and humans.
ai-an5:88.3.1_0: A senior mendicant who has five qualities is acting for the welfare and happiness of the people, for the benefit, welfare, and happiness of gods and humans.
ai-an5:88.4.2_0: They are senior and have long gone forth.
ai-an5:88.4.3_0: They’re well-known, famous, with a large following that includes both laypeople and renunciates.
ai-an5:88.4.4_0: They receive robes, alms-food, lodgings, and medicines and supplies for the sick.
ai-an5:88.4.5_0: They’re very learned, remembering and keeping what they’ve learned. These teachings are good in the beginning, good in the middle, and good in the end, meaningful and well-phrased, describing a spiritual practice that’s entirely full and pure. They are very learned in such teachings, remembering them, reinforcing them by recitation, mentally scrutinizing them, and comprehending them theoretically.
ai-an5:88.4.6_0: And they have right view and an undistorted perspective. They draw many people away from false teachings and establish them in the true teaching.
ai-an5:88.4.7_0: People follow their example, thinking that the senior mendicant is senior and has long gone forth. Or that they’re well-known, famous, with a large following that includes both laypeople and renunciates. Or that they receive robes, alms-food, lodgings, and medicines and supplies for the sick. Or that they’re very learned, remembering and keeping what they’ve learned.
ai-an5:88.4.8_0: A senior mendicant who has these five qualities is acting for the welfare and happiness of the people, for the benefit, welfare, and happiness of gods and humans.”
ai-an5:89.1.1_0: “These five things lead to the decline of a mendicant trainee.
ai-an5:89.1.3_0: They relish work, talk, sleep, and company. And they don’t review the extent of their mind’s freedom.
ai-an5:89.1.4_0: These five things lead to the decline of a mendicant trainee.
ai-an5:89.2.1_0: These five things don’t lead to the decline of a mendicant trainee.
ai-an5:89.2.3_0: They don’t relish work, talk, sleep, and company. And they review the extent of their mind’s freedom.
ai-an5:89.2.4_0: These five things don’t lead to the decline of a mendicant trainee.”
ai-an5:90.1.1_0: “These five things lead to the decline of a mendicant trainee.
ai-an5:90.1.3_0: Firstly, a mendicant trainee has many duties and responsibilities, and is competent in many tasks.
ai-an5:90.1.4_0: They neglect retreat, and are not committed to internal serenity of heart.
ai-an5:90.1.5_0: This is the first thing that leads to the decline of a mendicant trainee.
ai-an5:90.2.1_0: Furthermore, a mendicant trainee spends their day doing trivial work.
ai-an5:90.2.2_0: They neglect retreat, and are not committed to internal serenity of heart.
ai-an5:90.2.3_0: This is the second thing that leads to the decline of a mendicant trainee.
ai-an5:90.3.1_0: Furthermore, a mendicant trainee mixes closely with laypeople and renunciates, socializing inappropriately like a layperson.
ai-an5:90.3.2_0: They neglect retreat, and are not committed to internal serenity of heart.
ai-an5:90.3.3_0: This is the third thing that leads to the decline of a mendicant trainee.
ai-an5:90.4.1_0: Furthermore, a mendicant trainee enters the town at the wrong time, and returns too late in the day.
ai-an5:90.4.2_0: They neglect retreat, and are not committed to internal serenity of heart.
ai-an5:90.4.3_0: This is the fourth thing that leads to the decline of a mendicant trainee.
ai-an5:90.5.1_0: Furthermore, a mendicant trainee doesn’t get to take part in talk about self-effacement that helps open the heart, when they want, without trouble or difficulty. That is,
ai-an5:90.5.2_0: talk about fewness of wishes, contentment, seclusion, aloofness, arousing energy, ethics, immersion, wisdom, freedom, and the knowledge and vision of freedom.
ai-an5:90.5.3_0: They neglect retreat, and are not committed to internal serenity of heart.
ai-an5:90.5.4_0: This is the fifth thing that leads to the decline of a mendicant trainee.
ai-an5:90.5.5_0: These five things lead to the decline of a mendicant trainee.
ai-an5:90.6.1_0: These five things don’t lead to the decline of a mendicant trainee.
ai-an5:90.6.3_0: Firstly, a mendicant trainee doesn’t have many duties and responsibilities, even though they are competent in many tasks.
ai-an5:90.6.4_0: They don’t neglect retreat, and are committed to internal serenity of heart.
ai-an5:90.6.5_0: This is the first thing that doesn’t lead to the decline of a mendicant trainee.
ai-an5:90.7.1_0: Furthermore, a mendicant trainee doesn’t spend their day doing trivial work.
ai-an5:90.7.2_0: They don’t neglect retreat, and are committed to internal serenity of heart.
ai-an5:90.7.3_0: This is the second thing that doesn’t lead to the decline of a mendicant trainee.
ai-an5:90.8.1_0: Furthermore, a mendicant trainee doesn’t mix closely with laypeople and renunciates, socializing inappropriately like a layperson.
ai-an5:90.8.2_0: They don’t neglect retreat, and are committed to internal serenity of heart.
ai-an5:90.8.3_0: This is the third thing that doesn’t lead to the decline of a mendicant trainee.
ai-an5:90.9.1_0: Furthermore, a mendicant trainee doesn’t enter the village too early or return too late in the day.
ai-an5:90.9.2_0: They don’t neglect retreat, and are committed to internal serenity of heart.
ai-an5:90.9.3_0: This is the fourth thing that doesn’t lead to the decline of a mendicant trainee.
ai-an5:90.10.1_0: Furthermore, a mendicant trainee doesn’t get to take part in talk about self-effacement that helps open the heart, when they want, without trouble or difficulty. That is,
ai-an5:90.10.2_0: talk about fewness of wishes, contentment, seclusion, aloofness, arousing energy, ethics, immersion, wisdom, freedom, and the knowledge and vision of freedom.
ai-an5:90.10.3_0: They don’t neglect retreat, and are committed to internal serenity of heart.
ai-an5:90.10.4_0: This is the fifth thing that doesn't lead to the decline of a mendicant trainee.
ai-an5:90.10.5_0: These five things don’t lead to the decline of a mendicant trainee.”
ai-an5:90.10.7_0: The fourth sub-chapter on senior monks is finished.
ai-an5:90.11.4_0: The Elder, because of the trainee,
ai-an5:91.1.3_0: Accomplishment in faith, ethics, learning, generosity, and wisdom.
ai-an5:92.1.3_0: Accomplishment in ethics, immersion, wisdom, and knowledge and vision of freedom.
ai-an5:93.1.1_0: “Mendicants, there are these five ways of being inclusive.
ai-an5:93.1.3_0: One declares enlightenment out of stupidity and folly.
ai-an5:93.1.4_0: Or because of wicked desires, being naturally full of desires.
ai-an5:93.1.5_0: Or because of madness and mental disorder.
ai-an5:93.1.6_0: And they declare enlightenment out of overestimation.
ai-an5:93.1.8_0: These are the five ways of being inclusive.”
ai-an5:94.1.1_0: “Mendicants, there are these five ways of living comfortably.
ai-an5:94.1.3_0: Now, take a mendicant who, quite secluded from sensual pleasures, secluded from unskillful qualities, enters and remains in the first absorption, which has the rapture and bliss born of seclusion, while placing the mind and keeping it connected.
ai-an5:94.1.4_3: dwells having attained the fourth absorption.
ai-an5:94.1.5_0: They realize the undefiled freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom in this very life. And they live having realized it with their own insight due to the ending of defilements.
ai-an5:94.1.6_0: These are the five ways of living at ease.”
ai-an5:95.1.1_0: “Mendicants, a mendicant who has five things will soon penetrate the unshakable.
ai-an5:95.1.3_0: It’s when a mendicant has attained the textual analysis of meaning, text, terminology, and eloquence, and they review the extent of their mind’s freedom.
ai-an5:95.1.4_0: A mendicant who has these five things will soon penetrate the unshakable.”
ai-an5:96.1.1_0: “Mendicants, a mendicant cultivating mindfulness of breathing who has five things will soon penetrate the unshakable.
ai-an5:96.1.3_0: It’s when a mendicant has little dust in their life, but they haven’t achieved their life.
ai-an5:96.1.4_0: They eat little, not devoted to filling their stomach.
ai-an5:96.1.5_0: They are rarely drowsy, and are dedicated to wakefulness.
ai-an5:96.1.6_0: They’re very learned, remembering and keeping what they’ve learned. These teachings are good in the beginning, good in the middle, and good in the end, meaningful and well-phrased, describing a spiritual practice that’s entirely full and pure. They are very learned in such teachings, remembering them, reinforcing them by recitation, mentally scrutinizing them, and comprehending them theoretically.
ai-an5:96.1.7_0: They review the extent of their mind’s freedom.
ai-an5:96.1.8_0: A mendicant cultivating mindfulness of breathing who has these five things will soon penetrate the unshakable.”
ai-an5:96.1.9_0: The sixth offering to an individual.
ai-an5:97.1.1_0: “Mendicants, a mendicant developing mindfulness of breathing who has five things will soon penetrate the unshakable.
ai-an5:97.1.3_0: It’s when a mendicant has little dust in their life, but they haven’t achieved their life.
ai-an5:97.1.4_0: They eat little, not devoted to filling their stomach.
ai-an5:97.1.5_0: They are rarely drowsy, and are dedicated to wakefulness.
ai-an5:97.1.6_0: They get to take part in talk about self-effacement that helps open the heart, when they want, without trouble or difficulty. That is,
ai-an5:97.1.7_1: Such the knowledge and vision of freedom, they get to obtain such things.
ai-an5:97.1.8_0: They review the extent of their mind’s freedom.
ai-an5:97.1.9_0: A mendicant developing mindfulness of breathing who has these five things will soon penetrate the unshakable.”
ai-an5:98.1.1_0: “Mendicants, a mendicant practicing mindfulness of breathing who has five things will soon penetrate the unshakable.
ai-an5:98.1.3_0: It’s when a mendicant has little dust in their life, but they haven’t achieved their life.
ai-an5:98.1.4_0: They eat little, not devoted to filling their stomach.
ai-an5:98.1.5_0: They are rarely drowsy, and are dedicated to wakefulness.
ai-an5:98.1.6_0: They live in the wilderness, in remote lodgings.
ai-an5:98.1.7_0: They review the extent of their mind’s freedom.
ai-an5:98.1.8_0: A mendicant practicing mindfulness of breathing who has these five things will soon penetrate the unshakable.”
ai-an5:99.1.1_0: “Mendicants, towards the lion, king of beasts, came out in the evening time.
ai-an5:99.1.2_0: he leaves the mango tree transfer.
ai-an5:99.1.3_0: looks all around the four directions,
ai-an5:99.1.4_0: and roars his lion’s roar three times.
ai-an5:99.1.5_0: if she roars her lion’s roar three times, and then departs;
ai-an5:99.1.6_0: If he strikes an elephant, he does it carefully, not carelessly.
ai-an5:99.1.7_0: If he gives a large big sacrifice, he does it carefully, not carelessly.
ai-an5:99.1.8_0: If he strikes annoyance, he does it carefully, not carelessly.
ai-an5:99.1.9_0: or even if he gives a teaching, he does it carefully, not carelessly.
ai-an5:99.1.10_0: or any smaller creatures—even a hare or a cat—he does it carefully, not carelessly.
ai-an5:99.1.12_0: Thinking: ‘May I not lose my way.’
ai-an5:99.2.1_0: ‘Lion’ is a term for the Realized One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha.
ai-an5:99.2.2_0: When the Realized One teaches Dhamma to an assembly, this is his lion’s roar.
ai-an5:99.2.3_0: When the Realized One teaches the monks ...
ai-an5:99.2.4_0: When the Realized One teaches the Dhamma to the Realized One, he teaches them carefully, not carelessly.
ai-an5:99.2.7_0: or ordinary people—even food-carriers and hunters—he teaches them carefully, not carelessly.
ai-an5:99.2.9_0: Because the Realized One has respect and reverence for the teaching.”
ai-an5:100.1.2_0: at one time the Fortunate One was dwelling near Kosambī, in Ghosita’s Monastery.
ai-an5:100.1.3_0: At that time the Koliyan named Kakudha—Venerable Mahāmoggallāna’s supporter—had recently passed away and been reborn in a certain host of mind-made gods.

ai-an5:100.4.4_1: and after approaching and worshipping me, he stood on one side.
ai-an5:100.4.4_2: Standing to one side, the god Kakudha said to me:
ai-an5:100.4.7_0: And as that thought arose, Devadatta lost that psychic power.’
ai-an5:100.4.8_0: That’s what the god Kakudha said,
ai-an5:100.4.9_0: Then he bowed and respectfully circled me, keeping me on his right side, before vanishing right there.”

ai-an5:100.5.2_0: everything he says is correct and not otherwise?”
ai-an5:100.5.4_0: everything he says is correct and not otherwise?”
ai-an5:100.5.7_0: Now that silly man Devadatta will expose himself by his own deeds.
ai-an5:100.6.1_0: Moggallāna, there are these five teachers found in the world.
ai-an5:100.6.3_0: One kind of teacher is impure in behavior, while claiming it is pure.
ai-an5:100.6.5_0: ‘This teacher has impure ethical conduct, but claims to be ethically pure.
ai-an5:100.6.6_0: They wouldn’t like it if we were to tell the laypeople.
ai-an5:100.6.7_0: But how can we treat him with an disagreeable way?
ai-an5:100.6.8_0: But they consent to robes, alms-food, lodgings, and medicines and supplies for the sick.
ai-an5:100.6.9_0: He will be known through his own actions.’
ai-an5:100.6.10_0: The disciples conceal the impure behavior of such a teacher.
ai-an5:100.6.11_0: And the teacher expects his disciples to conceal it.
ai-an5:100.7.1_0: Another kind of teacher is impure in livelihood, while claiming it is pure.
ai-an5:100.7.3_0: ‘This teacher has impure livelihood, but claims to have pure livelihood.
ai-an5:100.7.4_0: They wouldn’t like it if we were to tell the laypeople.
ai-an5:100.7.5_0: But how can we treat him with an disagreeable way?
ai-an5:100.7.6_0: But they consent to robes, alms-food, lodgings, and medicines and supplies for the sick.
ai-an5:100.7.7_0: He will be known through his own actions.’
ai-an5:100.7.8_0: The disciples conceal the impure livelihood of such a teacher.
ai-an5:100.7.9_0: and the teacher expects them to do so.
ai-an5:100.8.1_0: Furthermore, some teacher with impure teaching claims: ‘I am pure in teaching. My teaching is pure, bright, uncorrupted.’
ai-an5:100.8.3_0: ‘This teacher has impure teaching, but claims to have pure teaching.
ai-an5:100.8.4_0: They wouldn’t like it if we were to tell the laypeople.
ai-an5:100.8.5_0: But how can we treat him with an disagreeable way?
ai-an5:100.8.6_0: But they consent to robes, alms-food, lodgings, and medicines and supplies for the sick.
ai-an5:100.8.7_0: He will be known through his own actions.’
ai-an5:100.8.8_0: The disciples of such a teacher cover up their teacher’s teaching,
ai-an5:100.8.9_0: And the teacher expects his disciples to conceal them.
ai-an5:100.9.1_0: Still another kind of teacher gives impure explanations, while claiming they are pure.
ai-an5:100.9.3_0: ‘This teacher has impure answers, but claims to have pure answers.
ai-an5:100.9.4_0: They wouldn’t like it if we were to tell the laypeople.
ai-an5:100.9.5_0: But how can we treat him with an disagreeable way?
ai-an5:100.9.6_0: But they consent to robes, alms-food, lodgings, and medicines and supplies for the sick.
ai-an5:100.9.7_0: He will be known through his own actions.’
ai-an5:100.9.8_0: The disciples conceal the impure explanations of such a teacher.
ai-an5:100.9.9_0: and the teacher expects them to do so.
ai-an5:100.10.1_0: Still another kind of teacher has impure knowledge and vision, while claiming they are pure.
ai-an5:100.10.3_0: ‘This teacher has impure knowledge and vision, while claiming they are pure.
ai-an5:100.10.4_0: They wouldn’t like it if we were to tell the laypeople.
ai-an5:100.10.5_0: But how can we treat him with an disagreeable way?
ai-an5:100.10.6_0: But they consent to robes, alms-food, lodgings, and medicines and supplies for the sick.
ai-an5:100.10.7_0: He will be known through his own actions.’
ai-an5:100.10.8_0: The disciples conceal the impure knowledge and vision of such a teacher.
ai-an5:100.10.9_0: And the teacher expects his disciples to conceal it.
ai-an5:100.10.10_0: These are the five teachers found in the world.
ai-an5:100.11.1_0: But in my case, I claim my behavior is pure because it is.
ai-an5:100.11.2_0: My disciples don’t cover up my conduct, and I don’t expect them to.
ai-an5:100.11.3_0: I have pure livelihood, and I claim: ‘I am pure in livelihood. My livelihood is pure, bright, uncorrupted.’
ai-an5:100.11.4_0: My disciples don’t cover up my livelihood, and I don’t expect them to.
ai-an5:100.11.5_0: I have pure teaching, and I claim: ‘I am pure in teaching. My teaching is pure, bright, uncorrupted.’
ai-an5:100.11.6_0: My disciples don’t cover up my teaching, and I don’t expect them to.
ai-an5:100.11.7_0: I have pure answers, and I claim: ‘I am pure in how I answer. My answers are pure, bright, uncorrupted.’
ai-an5:100.11.8_0: My disciples don’t cover up my answers, and I don’t expect them to.
ai-an5:100.11.9_0: I have pure knowledge and vision, and I claim: ‘I am pure in knowledge and vision. My knowledge and vision are pure, bright, uncorrupted.’
ai-an5:100.11.10_0: My disciples don’t cover up my knowledge and vision, and I don’t expect them to.”
ai-an5:100.11.12_0: The fifth sub-chapter on Kakudha is finished.
ai-an5:100.12.5_0: The second rains residence was completed.
ai-an5:101.1.1_0: “Mendicants, these five qualities make a trainee assured.
ai-an5:101.1.3_0: It’s when a mendicant is faithful, ethical, learned, energetic, and wise.
ai-an5:101.2.1_0: If the insecurities of a horse person is not faithful ...
ai-an5:101.2.2_0: That’s why this teaching is a trainee assured.
ai-an5:101.3.1_0: An ethical person doesn’t have the insecurities of someone who is unethical.
ai-an5:101.3.2_0: That’s why this teaching is a trainee assured.
ai-an5:101.4.1_0: When an uneducated person has learned little insecurities, they don’t have the insecurities.
ai-an5:101.4.2_0: That’s why this teaching is a trainee assured.
ai-an5:101.5.1_0: An energetic person doesn’t have the insecurities of a lazy person.
ai-an5:101.5.2_0: That’s why this teaching is a trainee assured.
ai-an5:101.6.1_0: An witless person doesn’t have the insecurities of someone who is wise.
ai-an5:101.6.2_0: That’s why this teaching is a trainee assured.
ai-an5:101.6.3_0: These are the five qualities that make a trainee assured.”
ai-an5:102.1.1_0: “Mendicants, even if a monk is of impeccable character, he might be suspected and distrusted as a ‘bad monk’ for five reasons.
ai-an5:102.2.2_0: It’s when a monk frequently collects alms from prostitutes, widows, voluptuous girls, eunuchs, or nuns.
ai-an5:102.3.1_0: Even if a monk is of impeccable character, he might be suspected and distrusted as a ‘bad monk’ for these five reasons.”
ai-an5:103.1.1_0: “Mendicants, a master thief with five factors breaks into houses, plunders wealth, steals from isolated buildings, and commits highway robbery.
ai-an5:103.1.3_0: A master thief relies on rough ground, on thick cover, and on powerful individuals; they pay bribes, and they act alone.
ai-an5:103.2.1_0: And how does a master thief rely on rough ground?
ai-an5:103.2.2_0: It’s when a master thief relies on inaccessible riverlands or rugged mountains.
ai-an5:103.2.3_0: That’s how a master thief relies on rough ground.
ai-an5:103.3.1_0: And how does a master thief rely on thick cover?
ai-an5:103.3.2_0: It’s when a master thief relies on grass or trees. And it’s robbed or a big tree, or a large tree reaps.
ai-an5:103.3.3_0: That’s how a master thief relies on thick cover.
ai-an5:103.4.1_0: And how does a master thief rely on powerful individuals?
ai-an5:103.4.2_0: It’s when a master thief relies on rulers or their ministers.
ai-an5:103.4.4_0: ‘If anyone accuses me of anything, these rulers or their ministers will speak in my defense in the case.’
ai-an5:103.4.6_0: That’s how a master thief relies on powerful individuals.
ai-an5:103.5.1_0: And how is a master thief acts of wealth?
ai-an5:103.5.2_0: A master thief is rich, affluent, and wealthy.
ai-an5:103.5.4_0: ‘If anyone accuses me of anything, I’ll settle it with a bribe.’
ai-an5:103.5.6_0: That’s how a master thief is a bandit of wealth.
ai-an5:103.6.1_0: And how does a master thief act alone?
ai-an5:103.6.2_0: It’s when a master thief carries out robbery all alone.
ai-an5:103.6.4_0: So that their secret plans are not leaked to others.
ai-an5:103.6.5_0: That’s how a master thief acts alone.
ai-an5:103.7.1_0: A master thief with these five factors breaks into houses, plunders wealth, steals from isolated buildings, and commits highway robbery.
ai-an5:103.8.1_0: In the same way, when a bad mendicant has five factors, they keep themselves broken and damaged. They deserve to be blamed and criticized by sensible people, and they make much bad karma.
ai-an5:103.8.3_0: A bad mendicant relies on rough ground, on thick cover, and on powerful individuals; they pay bribes, and they act alone.
ai-an5:103.9.1_0: And how does a bad mendicant rely on uneven ground?
ai-an5:103.9.2_0: It’s when a bad mendicant has unethical conduct by way of body, speech, and mind.
ai-an5:103.9.3_0: That’s how a bad mendicant relies on uneven ground.
ai-an5:103.10.1_0: And how does a bad mendicant rely on thick cover?
ai-an5:103.10.2_0: It’s when a bad mendicant has wrong view, he’s attached to an extremist view.
ai-an5:103.10.3_0: That’s how a bad mendicant relies on thick cover.
ai-an5:103.11.1_0: And how does a bad mendicant rely on powerful individuals?
ai-an5:103.11.2_0: It’s when a bad mendicant relies on rulers or their ministers.
ai-an5:103.11.4_0: ‘If anyone accuses me of anything, these rulers or their ministers will speak in my defense in the case.’
ai-an5:103.11.6_0: That’s how a bad mendicant relies on powerful individuals.
ai-an5:103.12.1_0: And how does a bad mendicant have wealth?
ai-an5:103.12.2_0: It’s when a bad mendicant receives robes, alms-food, lodgings, and medicines and supplies for the sick.
ai-an5:103.12.4_0: ‘If anyone accuses me of anything, I’ll settle it with a bribe.’
ai-an5:103.12.6_0: That’s how a bad mendicant has wealth.
ai-an5:103.13.1_0: And how does a bad mendicant act alone?
ai-an5:103.13.2_0: It’s when a bad mendicant dwells alone in the borderlands.
ai-an5:103.13.3_0: They visit families there to get material possessions.
ai-an5:103.13.4_0: That’s how a bad mendicant acts alone.
ai-an5:103.14.1_0: When a bad mendicant has these five factors, they keep themselves broken and damaged. They deserve to be blamed and criticized by sensible people, and they make much bad karma.”
ai-an5:104.1.1_0: “Mendicants, a mendicant with five qualities is an exquisite ascetic of ascetics.
ai-an5:104.2.2_0: It’s when a mendicant usually uses only what they’ve been invited to accept ...
ai-an5:104.2.2_1: They’d usually use only what they’ve been invited to accept—
ai-an5:104.2.2_2: They’d usually use only what they’ve been invited to accept—
ai-an5:104.2.2_3: They’d usually use only what they’ve been invited to accept—robes, alms-food, lodgings, and medicines and supplies for the sick—
ai-an5:104.2.3_0: When living with other spiritual companions, they usually treat them agreeably by way of body, speech, and mind,
ai-an5:104.2.3_1: usually treat them with agreeable words.
ai-an5:104.2.3_2: using treat agreeably with pleasant thoughts,
ai-an5:104.2.4_0: And I usually present them with agreeable things.
ai-an5:104.2.5_0: They’re healthy, so the various unpleasant feelings—stemming from disorders of bile, phlegm, wind, or their conjunction; or caused by change in weather, by not taking care of themselves, by overexertion, or as the result of past deeds—usually don’t come up.
ai-an5:104.2.6_0: They get the four absorptions—blissful meditations in the present life that belong to the higher mind—when they want, without trouble or difficulty.
ai-an5:104.2.7_0: They realize the undefiled freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom in this very life. And they live having realized it with their own insight due to the ending of defilements.
ai-an5:104.2.8_0: A mendicant with these five qualities is an exquisite ascetic of ascetics.
ai-an5:104.3.1_0: For if anyone should be rightly called
ai-an5:104.3.1_1: it’s the an exquisite ascetic of ascetics, it’s me.
ai-an5:104.3.1_2: ‘Ascetics are an exquisite ascetic of ascetics.’
ai-an5:104.3.2_0: For I usually use only what I’ve been invited to accept.
ai-an5:104.3.2_1: usually use only what I’ve been invited to accept ...
ai-an5:104.3.2_2: usually use only what I’ve been invited to accept.
ai-an5:104.3.2_3: usually use only what I’ve been invited to accept ...
ai-an5:104.3.3_0: When living with other spiritual practitioners, I usually treat them.
ai-an5:104.3.3_1: usually treat them with agreeable words.
ai-an5:104.3.3_2: using treat agreeably with pleasant thoughts,
ai-an5:104.3.4_0: And I usually present them with agreeable things.
ai-an5:104.3.5_1: I am rarely ill or unwell.”
ai-an5:104.3.6_0: I get the four absorptions when I want, without trouble or difficulty.
ai-an5:104.3.7_0: And I’ve realized the undefiled freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom in this very life.
ai-an5:104.4.1_0: For if anyone should be rightly called
ai-an5:104.4.1_1: it’s the an exquisite ascetic of ascetics, it’s me.
ai-an5:105.1.1_0: “Mendicants, there are these five ways of living comfortably.
ai-an5:105.1.3_0: It’s when a mendicant consistently treats their spiritual companions with kindness by way of body, speech, and mind, both in public and in private.
ai-an5:105.1.3_1: and mind, both in public and in private.
ai-an5:105.1.4_0: They live according to the precepts shared with their spiritual companions, both in public and in private. Those precepts are unbroken, impeccable, spotless, and unmarred, liberating, praised by sensible people, not mistaken, and leading to immersion.
ai-an5:105.1.5_0: They live according to the view shared with their spiritual companions, both in public and in private. That view is noble and emancipating, and brings one who practices it to the complete ending of suffering.
ai-an5:105.1.6_0: These are the five ways of living at ease.”
ai-an5:106.1.1_0: at one time the Fortunate One was dwelling near Kosambī, in Ghosita’s Monastery.
ai-an5:106.1.2_0: Then Venerable Ānanda went up to the Buddha,
ai-an5:106.1.2_2: After the meal, on his return from alms-round, he went to the Buddha, bowed, sat down to one side, and told him what had happened.
ai-an5:106.2.1_0: “Sir, how could a mendicant live comfortably while staying in a monastic community?”
ai-an5:106.2.2_0: “It’s when a mendicant is accomplished in their own ethical conduct, but they don’t urge others to be ethical.
ai-an5:106.2.3_0: That’s how a mendicant could live comfortably while staying in a monastic community.”
ai-an5:106.3.1_0: “But sir, might there be another way for a mendicant to live comfortably while staying in a monastic community?”
ai-an5:106.3.3_0: But when a mendicant is accomplished in their own ethical conduct, but they don’t urge others to be ethical.
ai-an5:106.3.4_0: And they watch themselves, but don’t watch others.
ai-an5:106.3.5_0: That’s how a mendicant could live comfortably while staying in a monastic community.”
ai-an5:106.4.1_0: “But sir, might there be another way for a mendicant to live comfortably while staying in a monastic community?”
ai-an5:106.4.3_0: But when a mendicant is accomplished in their own ethical conduct, but they don’t urge others to be ethical.
ai-an5:106.4.4_0: And they watch themselves, but don’t watch others.
ai-an5:106.4.5_0: And they’re not well-known, but aren’t bothered by that.
ai-an5:106.4.6_0: That’s how a mendicant could live comfortably while staying in a monastic community.”
ai-an5:106.5.1_0: “But sir, might there be another way for a mendicant to live comfortably while staying in a monastic community?”
ai-an5:106.5.3_0: But when a mendicant is accomplished in their own ethical conduct, but they don’t urge others to be ethical.
ai-an5:106.5.4_0: And they watch themselves, but don’t watch others.
ai-an5:106.5.5_0: And they’re not well-known, but aren’t bothered by that.
ai-an5:106.5.6_0: And they get the four absorptions—blissful meditations in the present life that belong to the higher mind—when they want, without trouble or difficulty.
ai-an5:106.5.7_0: That’s how a mendicant could live comfortably while staying in a monastic community.”
ai-an5:106.6.1_0: “But sir, might there be another way for a mendicant to live comfortably while staying in a monastic community?”
ai-an5:106.6.3_0: But when a mendicant is accomplished in their own ethical conduct, but they don’t urge others to be ethical.
ai-an5:106.6.4_0: And they watch themselves, but don’t watch others.
ai-an5:106.6.5_0: And they’re not well-known, but aren’t bothered by that.
ai-an5:106.6.6_0: And they get the four absorptions—blissful meditations in the present life that belong to the higher mind—when they want, without trouble or difficulty.
ai-an5:106.6.7_0: They realize the undefiled freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom in this very life, and they live having realized it with their own insight due to the ending of defilements.
ai-an5:106.6.8_0: That’s how a mendicant could live comfortably while staying in a monastic community.
ai-an5:106.7.1_0: And I say that there is no better or finer way of living comfortably than this.”
ai-an5:106.7.2_0: The sixth offering to an individual.
ai-an5:107.1.1_0: “Mendicants, a mendicant with five qualities is worthy of offerings dedicated to the gods, worthy of hospitality, worthy of a religious donation, worthy of veneration with joined palms, and is the supreme field of merit for the world.
ai-an5:107.2.2_0: It’s when a mendicant is accomplished in ethics, immersion, wisdom, freedom, and the knowledge and vision of freedom.
ai-an5:107.3.1_0: A mendicant with these five qualities is worthy of offerings dedicated to the gods, worthy of hospitality, worthy of a religious donation, worthy of veneration with joined palms, and is the supreme field of merit for the world.”
ai-an5:108.1.1_0: “Mendicants, a mendicant with five qualities is worthy of offerings dedicated to the gods, worthy of hospitality, worthy of a religious donation, worthy of veneration with joined palms, and is the supreme field of merit for the world.
ai-an5:108.1.1_1: they are an unsurpassed field of merit for the world.
ai-an5:108.2.2_0: It’s when a mendicant has the entire spectrum of an adept’s ethics, immersion, wisdom, freedom, and knowledge and vision of freedom.
ai-an5:108.2.3_0: A mendicant with these five qualities is worthy of offerings dedicated to the gods. ...
ai-an5:108.2.3_1: they are an unsurpassed field of merit for the world.”
ai-an5:109.1.1_0: “Mendicants, a mendicant with five qualities is at ease in any quarter.
ai-an5:109.1.3_0: It’s when a mendicant is ethical, restrained in the monastic code, conducting themselves well and seeking alms in suitable places. Seeing danger in the slightest fault, they keep the rules they’ve undertaken.
ai-an5:109.1.4_0: They’re very learned, remembering and keeping what they’ve learned. These teachings are good in the beginning, good in the middle, and good in the end, meaningful and well-phrased, describing a spiritual practice that’s entirely full and pure. They are very learned in such teachings, remembering them, reinforcing them by recitation, mentally scrutinizing them, and comprehending them theoretically.
ai-an5:109.1.5_0: They’re content with any kind of robes, alms-food, lodgings, and medicines and supplies for the sick.
ai-an5:109.1.6_0: they get the four absorptions—blissful meditations in the present life that belong to the higher mind—when they want, without trouble or difficulty.
ai-an5:109.1.7_0: They realize the undefiled freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom in this very life. And they live having realized it with their own insight due to the ending of defilements.
ai-an5:109.1.8_0: A mendicant with these five qualities is at ease in any quarter.”
ai-an5:110.1.1_0: “Mendicants, when a mendicant has five qualities they’re ready to frequent remote lodgings in the wilderness and the forest.
ai-an5:110.1.3_0: It’s when a mendicant is ethical, restrained in the code of conduct, with good behavior and supporters. Seeing danger in the slightest fault, they keep the rules they’ve undertaken.
ai-an5:110.1.5_0: They live with energy roused up. They’re strong, staunchly vigorous, not slacking off when it comes to developing skillful qualities.
ai-an5:110.1.6_0: they get the four absorptions—blissful meditations in the present life that belong to the higher mind—when they want, without trouble or difficulty.
ai-an5:110.1.7_0: They realize the undefiled freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom in this very life. And they live having realized it with their own insight due to the ending of defilements.
ai-an5:110.1.8_0: When a mendicant has these five qualities they’re ready to frequent remote lodgings in the wilderness and the forest.”
ai-an5:110.1.10_0: The first sub-chapter on dwellings is finished.
ai-an5:110.2.3_0: Ānanda, the training, and the trainee
ai-an5:110.2.4_0: the four quarters and the fifteenth.
ai-an5:111.1.1_0: “Mendicants, a mendicant with five qualities who visits families is unlikable and unlovable, not respected or admired.
ai-an5:111.1.3_0: They act as though they're close to people they hardly know. They give away things they don’t own. They over-associate with close friends. They whisper in the ear. And they ask for too much.
ai-an5:111.1.4_0: A mendicant with these five qualities who visits families is unlikable and unlovable, not respected or admired.
ai-an5:111.2.1_0: A mendicant with five qualities who visits families is dear and beloved, respected and admired.
ai-an5:111.2.3_0: They don’t act as though they're close to people they hardly know. They don’t give away things they don’t own. They don’t over-associate with close friends. They don’t whisper in the ear. And they don’t ask for too much.
ai-an5:111.2.4_0: A mendicant with these five qualities who visits families is dear and beloved, respected and admired.”
ai-an5:112.1.1_0: “Mendicants, you shouldn’t take an ascetic with five qualities to follow behind on almsround.
ai-an5:112.1.3_0: They walk too far away or too close behind. They don’t take your bowl when it’s full. They don’t warn you when your speech is bordering on an offense. They keep on interrupting while you’re speaking. And they’re witless, dull, and stupid.
ai-an5:112.1.4_0: You shouldn’t take an ascetic with these five qualities to follow behind on almsround.
ai-an5:112.2.1_0: You should take an ascetic with five qualities to follow behind on almsround.
ai-an5:112.2.3_0: They don’t walk too far away or too close behind. They take your bowl when it is full. They warn you when your speech is bordering on an offense. They don’t interrupt while you’re speaking. And they’re wise, bright, and clever.
ai-an5:112.2.4_0: You should take an ascetic with these five qualities to follow behind on almsround.”
ai-an5:113.1.1_0: “Mendicants, a mendicant who has five qualities can’t enter and remain in right immersion.
ai-an5:113.1.3_0: It’s when a mendicant can’t endure sights, sounds, smells, tastes, and touches.
ai-an5:113.1.4_0: A mendicant who has these five qualities can’t enter and remain in right immersion.
ai-an5:113.2.1_0: A mendicant who has five qualities can enter and remain in right immersion.
ai-an5:113.2.3_0: It’s when a mendicant can endure sights, sounds, smells, tastes, and touches.
ai-an5:113.2.4_0: A mendicant who has these five qualities can enter and remain in right immersion.”
ai-an5:114.1.1_0: At one time the Buddha was staying in the land of the Magadhans at Andhakavinda.
ai-an5:114.1.2_0: Then Venerable Ānanda went up to the Buddha,
ai-an5:114.2.1_0: “Ānanda, those mendicants who are junior, recently gone forth, newly come to this teaching and training should be encouraged, supported, and established in five things.
ai-an5:114.2.3_0: They should be encouraged, supported, and established in restraint in the monastic code: ‘Reverends, please be ethical. Live restrained in the code of conduct, conducting yourselves well and seeking alms in suitable places. Seeing danger in the slightest fault, keep the rules you’ve undertaken.’
ai-an5:114.3.1_0: They should be encouraged, supported, and established in sense restraint: ‘Reverends, please live with sense doors guarded, mindfully alert and on guard, with protected mind, having a heart protected by mindfulness.’
ai-an5:114.4.1_0: They should be encouraged, supported, and established in limiting their speech: ‘Reverends, please speak little. Put a limit on your speech.’
ai-an5:114.5.1_0: They should be encouraged, supported, and established in retreat: ‘Reverends, please live in the wilderness. Frequent remote lodgings in the wilderness and the forest.’
ai-an5:114.6.1_0: They should be encouraged, supported, and established in right perspective: ‘Reverends, please hold right view and have right perspective.’
ai-an5:114.6.2_0: Those mendicants who are junior, recently gone forth, newly come to this teaching and training should be encouraged, supported, and established in these five things.”
ai-an5:115.1.1_0: “Mendicants, a nun with five qualities is cast down to hell.
ai-an5:115.1.3_0: She is stingy with dwellings, families, material possessions, praise, and the teaching.
ai-an5:115.1.4_0: A nun with these five qualities is cast down to hell.
ai-an5:115.2.1_0: A nun with five qualities is raised up to heaven.
ai-an5:115.2.3_0: She is not stingy with dwellings, families, material possessions, praise, or the teaching.
ai-an5:115.2.4_0: A nun with these five qualities is raised up to heaven.”
ai-an5:116.1.1_0: “Mendicants, a nun with five qualities is cast down to hell.
ai-an5:116.1.3_0: Without examining or scrutinizing, they praise those deserving of criticism
ai-an5:116.1.4_0: and criticizes those deserving of praise.
ai-an5:116.1.5_0: She arouses faith in things that are dubious,
ai-an5:116.1.6_0: and doesn’t arouse faith in things that are inspiring.
ai-an5:116.1.7_0: And they waste a gift given in faith.
ai-an5:116.1.8_0: A nun with these five qualities is cast down to hell.
ai-an5:116.2.1_0: A nun with five qualities is raised up to heaven.
ai-an5:116.2.3_0: After examining and scrutinizing, they criticize those deserving of criticism
ai-an5:116.2.4_0: and praises those deserving of praise.
ai-an5:116.2.5_0: She doesn’t arouse faith in things that are dubious,
ai-an5:116.2.6_0: and does arouse faith in things that are inspiring.
ai-an5:116.2.7_0: And they don’t waste a gift given in faith.
ai-an5:116.2.8_0: A nun with these five qualities is raised up to heaven.”
ai-an5:116.2.9_0: The sixth offering to an individual.
ai-an5:117.1.1_0: “Mendicants, a nun with five qualities is cast down to hell.
ai-an5:117.1.3_0: Without examining or scrutinizing, they praise those deserving of criticism
ai-an5:117.1.4_0: and criticizes those deserving of praise.
ai-an5:117.1.7_0: And they waste a gift given in faith.
ai-an5:117.1.8_0: A nun with these five qualities is cast down to hell.
ai-an5:117.2.1_0: A nun with five qualities is raised up to heaven.
ai-an5:117.2.3_0: After examining and scrutinizing, they criticize those deserving of criticism
ai-an5:117.2.4_0: and praises those deserving of praise.
ai-an5:117.2.7_0: And they don’t waste a gift given in faith.
ai-an5:117.2.8_0: A nun with these five qualities is raised up to heaven.”

ai-an5:118.1.3_0: Without examining or scrutinizing, they praise those deserving of criticism
ai-an5:118.1.4_0: and criticizes those deserving of praise.
ai-an5:118.1.7_0: And they waste a gift given in faith.
ai-an5:118.1.8_0: A nun with these five qualities is cast down to hell.

ai-an5:118.2.7_0: And they don’t waste a gift given in faith.
ai-an5:118.2.8_0: A nun with these five qualities is raised up to heaven.”

ai-an5:119.1.3_0: Without examining or scrutinizing, they praise those deserving of criticism
ai-an5:119.1.4_0: and criticizes those deserving of praise.
ai-an5:119.1.7_0: And they waste a gift given in faith.
ai-an5:119.1.8_0: A nun with these five qualities is cast down to hell.

ai-an5:119.2.7_0: And they don’t waste a gift given in faith.
ai-an5:119.2.8_0: A nun with these five qualities is raised up to heaven.”
ai-an5:120.1.1_0: “Mendicants, a nun with five qualities is cast down to hell.
ai-an5:120.1.3_0: Without examining or scrutinizing, they praise those deserving of criticism
ai-an5:120.1.4_0: and criticizes those deserving of praise.
ai-an5:120.1.7_0: And they waste a gift given in faith.
ai-an5:120.1.8_0: A nun with these five qualities is cast down to hell.
ai-an5:120.2.1_0: A nun with five qualities is raised up to heaven.

ai-an5:120.2.4_0: and praises those deserving of praise.
ai-an5:120.2.7_0: And they don’t waste a gift given in faith.
ai-an5:120.2.8_0: A nun with these five qualities is raised up to heaven.”
ai-an5:120.2.10_0: The second sub-chapter on blind men is finished.
ai-an5:121.1.1_0: At one time the Buddha was staying near Vesālī, at the Great Wood, in the hall with the peaked roof.
ai-an5:121.1.2_0: Then in the late afternoon, the Buddha came out of retreat and went to the infirmary, where
ai-an5:121.1.3_0: he saw a certain mendicant who was weak and sick.
ai-an5:121.1.4_0: He sat down on the seat spread out,
ai-an5:121.2.1_0: “Mendicants, if a weak and sick mendicant does not neglect five things, it can be expected that
ai-an5:121.2.2_0: they will soon realize the undefiled freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom in this very life, and live having realized it with their own insight due to the ending of defilements.
ai-an5:121.3.2_0: A mendicant meditates observing the ugliness of the body, perceives the repulsiveness of food, perceives dissatisfaction with the whole world, observes the impermanence of all conditions, and has well established the perception of their own death.
ai-an5:121.3.3_0: If a weak and sick mendicant does not neglect these five things, it can be expected that
ai-an5:121.3.4_0: they will soon realize the undefiled freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom in this very life.”
ai-an5:122.1.1_0: “Mendicants, any monk or nun who develops and cultivates five qualities can expect one of two results:
ai-an5:122.1.2_0: enlightenment in the present life, or if there’s something left over, non-return.
ai-an5:122.2.2_0: It’s when a mendicant has well established mindfulness inside themselves in order to understand the arising and passing away of phenomena, meditates observing the ugliness of the body, perceives the repulsiveness of food, perceives dissatisfaction with the whole world, and observes the impermanence of all conditions.
ai-an5:122.2.3_0: Any monk or nun who develops and cultivates these five qualities can expect one of two results:
ai-an5:122.2.4_0: enlightenment in the present life, or if there’s something left over, non-return.”
ai-an5:123.1.1_0: “Mendicants, a patient with five qualities is hard to care for.
ai-an5:123.1.3_0: They do what is unsuitable. They don’t know moderation in what is suitable. They don’t take their medicine. Though their carer wants what’s best for them, they don’t accurately report their symptoms by saying when they’re getting worse, getting better, or staying the same. And they cannot endure physical pain—sharp, severe, acute, unpleasant, disagreeable, and life-threatening.
ai-an5:123.1.4_0: A patient with these five qualities is hard to care for.
ai-an5:123.2.1_0: A patient with five qualities is easy to care for.
ai-an5:123.2.3_0: They do what is suitable. They know moderation in what is suitable. They take their medicine. Because their carer wants what’s best for them, they accurately report their symptoms by saying when they’re getting worse, getting better, or staying the same. And they can endure physical pain—sharp, severe, acute, unpleasant, disagreeable, and life-threatening.
ai-an5:123.2.4_0: A patient with these five qualities is easy to care for.”
ai-an5:124.1.1_0: “Mendicants, a carer with five qualities is not competent to care for a patient.
ai-an5:124.1.4_0: They don’t know what is suitable and unsuitable, so they supply what is unsuitable and remove what is suitable.
ai-an5:124.1.5_0: They care for the sick for the sake of material benefits, not out of love.
ai-an5:124.1.6_0: They’re disgusted to remove feces, urine, vomit, or spit.
ai-an5:124.1.7_0: They’re not able to educate, encourage, fire up, and inspire the patient with a Dhamma talk from time to time.
ai-an5:124.1.8_0: A carer with these five qualities is not competent to care for a patient.
ai-an5:124.2.1_0: A carer with five qualities is competent to care for a patient.
ai-an5:124.2.4_0: They know what is suitable and unsuitable, so they remove what is unsuitable and supply what is suitable.
ai-an5:124.2.5_0: They care for the sick out of love, not for the sake of material benefits.
ai-an5:124.2.6_0: They’re not disgusted to remove feces, urine, vomit, or spit.
ai-an5:124.2.7_0: They’re able to educate, encourage, fire up, and inspire the patient with a Dhamma talk from time to time.
ai-an5:124.2.8_0: A carer with these five qualities is competent to care for a patient.”
ai-an5:125.1.3_0: Doing what is unsuitable, not knowing moderation in what is suitable, eating food unfit for consumption, activity at suitable times, and celibacy.
ai-an5:125.1.4_0: These are the five things that impede longevity.
ai-an5:125.2.3_0: Doing what is suitable, knowing moderation in what is suitable, eating food fit for consumption, activity at suitable times, and celibacy.
ai-an5:125.2.4_0: These are the five things that impede longevity.”
ai-an5:126.1.3_0: Doing what is unsuitable, not knowing moderation in what is suitable, eating food unfit for consumption, unethical behavior, and bad friends.
ai-an5:126.1.4_0: These are the five things that impede longevity.
ai-an5:126.2.3_0: Doing what is suitable, knowing moderation in what is suitable, eating food fit for consumption, ethical conduct, and good friends.
ai-an5:126.2.4_0: These are the five things that impede longevity.”
ai-an5:126.2.5_0: The sixth offering to an individual.
ai-an5:127.1.1_0: “Mendicants, a mendicant with five qualities is not fit to live apart from a Saṅgha community.
ai-an5:127.1.3_0: It’s when a mendicant is content with any kind of robe, alms-food, lodging, and medicines and supplies for the sick. And they’re not content with any kind of robes, alms-food, lodgings, and medicines and supplies for the sick.
ai-an5:127.1.4_0: A mendicant with these five qualities is not fit to live apart from a Saṅgha community.
ai-an5:127.2.1_0: A mendicant with five qualities is fit to live apart from a Saṅgha community.
ai-an5:127.2.3_0: It’s when a mendicant is content with any kind of robe, alms-food, lodging, and medicines and supplies for the sick. And they think a lot about renunciation.
ai-an5:127.2.4_0: A mendicant with these five qualities is fit to live apart from a Saṅgha community.”
ai-an5:128.1.1_0: “Mendicants, there are these five kinds of suffering for an ascetic.
ai-an5:128.1.3_0: It’s when a mendicant is content with any kind of robe, alms-food, lodging, and medicines and supplies for the sick. And they lead the spiritual life dissatisfied.
ai-an5:128.1.4_0: These are the five kinds of suffering for an ascetic.
ai-an5:128.2.1_0: There are these five kinds of happiness for an ascetic.
ai-an5:128.2.3_0: It’s when a mendicant is content with any kind of robe, alms-food, lodging, and medicines and supplies for the sick. And they lead the spiritual life satisfied.
ai-an5:128.2.4_0: These are five kinds of happiness for an ascetic.”
ai-an5:129.1.1_0: “Mendicants, these five fatal wounds lead to a place of loss, to hell.
ai-an5:129.1.3_0: Murdering your mother or father or a perfected one; maliciously shedding the blood of a Realized One; and causing a schism in the Saṅgha.
ai-an5:129.1.4_0: These five fatal wounds lead to a place of loss, to hell.”
ai-an5:130.1.3_0: Loss of relatives, wealth, health, ethics, and view.
ai-an5:130.1.4_0: It is not because of loss of relatives, wealth, or health that sentient beings, when their body breaks up, after death, are reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell.
ai-an5:130.1.5_0: It is because of loss of ethics or view that sentient beings, when their body breaks up, after death, are reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell.
ai-an5:130.2.3_0: endowment with relatives, wealth, health, ethics, and view.
ai-an5:130.2.4_0: It is not because of endowment with family, wealth, or health that sentient beings, when their body breaks up, after death, are reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm.
ai-an5:130.2.5_0: Some sentient beings, when their body breaks up, after death, are reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm because of accomplishment in ethics,
ai-an5:130.2.8_0: The third sub-chapter on sickness is finished.
ai-an5:130.3.2_0: Two times are hard to nurse:
ai-an5:130.3.4_0: and disparages come to an end.
ai-an5:131.1.1_0: “Mendicants, possessing five factors a wheel-turning monarch wields power only in a principled manner.
ai-an5:131.1.2_0: And this power cannot be undermined by any human enemy.
ai-an5:131.2.2_0: A wheel-turning monarch knows what is right, knows principle, knows moderation, knows the right time, and knows the assembly.
ai-an5:131.2.3_0: A wheel-turning monarch who possesses these five factors wields power only in a principled manner.
ai-an5:131.2.4_0: And this power cannot be undermined by any human enemy.
ai-an5:131.3.1_0: In the same way, possessing five factors a Realized One, a perfected one, a fully awakened Buddha rolls forth the supreme Wheel of Dhamma only in a principled manner.
ai-an5:131.3.2_0: And that wheel cannot be rolled back by any ascetic or brahmin or god or Māra or Brahmā or by anyone in the world.
ai-an5:131.4.2_0: A Realized One knows what is right, knows principle, knows moderation, knows the right time, and knows the assembly.
ai-an5:131.4.3_0: Possessing these five factors a Realized One, a perfected one, a fully awakened Buddha rolls forth the supreme Wheel of Dhamma only in a principled manner.
ai-an5:131.4.4_0: And that wheel cannot be turned back by any ascetic or brahmin or god or Māra or Brahmā or by anyone in the world.”
ai-an5:132.1.1_0: “Mendicants, possessing five factors a wheel-turning monarch’s oldest son who possesses five factors continues to wield the power set in motion by his father only in a principled manner.
ai-an5:132.1.2_0: And this power cannot be undermined by any human enemy.
ai-an5:132.2.2_0: A wheel-turning monarch’s oldest son knows what is right, knows principle, knows moderation, knows the right time, and knows the assembly.
ai-an5:132.2.3_0: A wheel-turning monarch’s oldest son who possesses these five factors continues to wield the power set in motion by his father only in a principled manner.
ai-an5:132.2.4_0: And this power cannot be undermined by any human enemy.
ai-an5:132.3.1_0: In the same way, possessing five factors Sāriputta rightly keeps rolling the supreme Wheel of Dhamma that was rolled forth by the Realized One.
ai-an5:132.3.2_0: And that wheel cannot be rolled back by any ascetic or brahmin or god or Māra or Brahmā or by anyone in the world.
ai-an5:132.4.2_0: Sāriputta knows the teachings, knows the meaning, has self-knowledge, knows moderation, knows the right time,
ai-an5:132.4.3_0: Possessing these five factors Sāriputta rightly keeps rolling the supreme Wheel of Dhamma that was rolled forth by the Realized One.
ai-an5:132.4.4_0: And that wheel cannot be rolled back by any ascetic or brahmin or god or Māra or Brahmā or by anyone in the world.”
ai-an5:133.1.1_0: “Mendicants, even a wheel-turning monarch, a just and principled king, does not wield power without having their own king.”
ai-an5:133.1.2_0: When he said this, one of the mendicants asked the Buddha,
ai-an5:133.1.3_0: “But who is the king of the wheel-turning monarch, the just and principled king?”
ai-an5:133.1.4_0: “It is principle, monk,” said the Buddha.
ai-an5:133.2.1_0: “Monk, a wheel-turning monarch provides just protection and security for his court, relying only on principle—honoring, respecting, and venerating principle, having principle as his flag, banner, and authority.
ai-an5:133.3.1_0: He provides just protection and security for his aristocrats, vassals, troops, brahmins and householders, people of town and country, ascetics and brahmins, beasts and birds.
ai-an5:133.3.1_1: Migajāla, brahmins and householders, ascetics and brahmins and householders, ascetics and brahmins and householders,
ai-an5:133.3.2_0: When he has done this, he wields power only in a principled manner.
ai-an5:133.3.3_0: And this power cannot be undermined by any human enemy.
ai-an5:133.4.1_0: In the same way, monk, a Realized One, a perfected one, a fully awakened Buddha, a just and principled king, provides just protection and security for the monks, relying only on principle—honoring, respecting, and venerating principle, having principle as his flag, banner, and authority.
ai-an5:133.4.2_0: ‘This kind of bodily action should be cultivated. This kind of bodily action should not be cultivated.
ai-an5:133.4.3_0: This kind of verbal action should be cultivated. This kind of verbal action should not be cultivated.
ai-an5:133.4.4_0: This kind of mental action should be cultivated. This kind of mental action should not be cultivated.
ai-an5:133.4.5_0: This kind of livelihood should be cultivated. This kind of livelihood should not be cultivated.
ai-an5:133.4.6_0: This kind of market town should be cultivated. This kind of market town should not be cultivated.’
ai-an5:133.5.1_0: In the same way, monk, a Realized One, a perfected one, a fully awakened Buddha, a just and principled king, provides just protection and security for the nuns ... laymen ... laywomen, relying only on principle—honoring, respecting, and venerating principle, having principle as his flag, banner, and authority.
ai-an5:133.5.1_2: female lay followers, and male lay followers,
ai-an5:133.5.2_0: ‘This kind of bodily action should be cultivated. This kind of bodily action should not be cultivated.
ai-an5:133.5.3_0: This kind of verbal action should be cultivated. This kind of verbal action should not be cultivated.
ai-an5:133.5.4_0: This kind of mental action should be cultivated. This kind of mental action should not be cultivated.
ai-an5:133.5.5_0: This kind of livelihood should be cultivated. This kind of livelihood should not be cultivated.
ai-an5:133.5.6_0: This kind of market town should be cultivated. This kind of market town should not be cultivated.’
ai-an5:133.6.1_0: When a Realized One, a perfected one, a fully awakened Buddha has provided just protection and security for the monks, nuns, laymen, and laywomen, he rolls forth the supreme Whel of Dhamma only in a principled manner.
ai-an5:133.6.2_0: And that wheel cannot be rolled back by any ascetic or brahmin or god or Māra or Brahmā or by anyone in the world.”
ai-an5:134.1.1_0: “Mendicants, anointed aristocratic king with five factors lives in whatever region they live in.
ai-an5:134.2.2_0: An anointed aristocratic king is well born on both his mother’s and father’s side, of pure descent, irrefutable and impeccable in questions of ancestry back to the seventh paternal generation.
ai-an5:134.2.3_0: He is rich, affluent, and wealthy, with a full treasury and storehouses.
ai-an5:134.2.4_0: He is powerful, having an army of four divisions that is obedient and carries out instructions.
ai-an5:134.2.5_0: He has a counselor who is astute, competent, and intelligent, able to think issues through as they bear upon the past, future, and present.
ai-an5:134.2.6_0: These four things bring his fame to fruition.
ai-an5:134.2.7_0: And when they have this fame, they live in whatever region they live in.
ai-an5:134.2.9_0: Because that is how it is for victors.
ai-an5:134.3.1_0: In the same way, a mendicant with five qualities lives with mind freed, no matter what region they live in.
ai-an5:134.3.3_0: It’s when mendicant is ethical, restrained in the monastic code, conducting themselves well and seeking alms in suitable places. Seeing danger in the slightest fault, they keep the rules they’ve undertaken.
ai-an5:134.3.4_0: This is like the anointed aristocratic king’s impeccable lineage.
ai-an5:134.3.5_0: They’re very learned, remembering and keeping what they’ve learned. These teachings are good in the beginning, good in the middle, and good in the end, meaningful and well-phrased, describing a spiritual practice that’s entirely full and pure. They are very learned in such teachings, remembering them, reinforcing them by recitation, mentally scrutinizing them, and comprehending them theoretically.
ai-an5:134.3.6_0: This is like the anointed aristocratic king being rich, affluent, and wealthy, with full treasury and storehouses.
ai-an5:134.3.7_0: They live with energy roused up for giving up unskillful qualities and embracing skillful qualities. They’re strong, staunchly vigorous, not slacking off when it comes to developing skillful qualities.
ai-an5:134.3.8_0: This is like the anointed aristocratic king having power.
ai-an5:134.3.9_0: They’re wise. They have the wisdom of arising and passing away which is noble, penetrative, and leads to the complete ending of suffering.
ai-an5:134.3.10_0: This is like the anointed aristocratic king having a counselor.
ai-an5:134.3.11_0: These four qualities bring their freedom to fruition.
ai-an5:134.3.12_0: This is the fifth thing that lives in region.
ai-an5:134.3.14_0: Because that is how it is for those whose mind is free.”
ai-an5:135.1.1_0: “Mendicants, an anointed aristocratic king’s eldest son with five factors aspires to kingship.
ai-an5:135.1.3_0: It’s when an anointed aristocratic king’s eldest son is well born on both his mother’s and father’s side, of pure descent, irrefutable and impeccable in questions of ancestry back to the seventh paternal generation.
ai-an5:135.1.4_0: He is attractive, good-looking, lovely, of surpassing beauty.
ai-an5:135.1.5_0: He is dear and beloved to her parents.
ai-an5:135.1.6_0: He is dear and beloved to the people of town and country.
ai-an5:135.1.7_0: He is trained and skilled in the arts of anointed aristocratic kings, such as elephant riding, horse riding, driving a chariot, archery, and swordsmanship.
ai-an5:135.2.3_0: Why shouldn’t I aspire to kingship?
ai-an5:135.2.5_0: Why shouldn’t I aspire to kingship?
ai-an5:135.2.6_0: I’m dear and beloved to my parents.
ai-an5:135.2.7_0: Why shouldn’t I aspire to kingship?
ai-an5:135.2.8_0: I’m dear and beloved to the people of town and country.
ai-an5:135.2.9_0: Why shouldn’t I aspire to kingship?
ai-an5:135.2.10_0: I’m trained and skilled in the arts of anointed aristocratic kings, such as elephant riding, horse riding, driving a chariot, archery, and swordsmanship.
ai-an5:135.2.11_0: Why shouldn’t I aspire to kingship?’
ai-an5:135.2.12_0: An anointed aristocratic king’s eldest son with these five factors aspires to kingship.
ai-an5:135.3.1_0: In the same way, a mendicant with five qualities aspires to end the defilements.
ai-an5:135.3.3_0: It’s when a mendicant has faith in the Realized One’s awakening:
ai-an5:135.3.4_0: ‘That Blessed One is perfected, a fully awakened Buddha, accomplished in knowledge and conduct, holy, knower of the world, supreme guide for those who wish to train, teacher of gods and humans, awakened, blessed.’
ai-an5:135.3.5_0: He is rarely ill or unwell. His stomach digests well, being neither too hot nor too cold, but just right, and fit for meditation.
ai-an5:135.3.6_0: They’re not devious or deceitful. They reveal themselves honestly to the Teacher or sensible spiritual companions.
ai-an5:135.3.7_0: They live with energy roused up for giving up unskillful qualities and embracing skillful qualities. They’re strong, staunchly vigorous, not slacking off when it comes to developing skillful qualities.
ai-an5:135.3.8_0: They’re wise. They have the wisdom of arising and passing away which is noble, penetrative, and leads to the complete ending of suffering.
ai-an5:135.4.2_0: ‘I am a person of faith; I have faith in the Realized One’s awakening ...
ai-an5:135.4.3_0: “That Blessed One is perfected, a fully awakened Buddha, accomplished in knowledge and conduct, holy, knower of the world, supreme guide for those who wish to train, teacher of gods and humans, awakened, blessed.”
ai-an5:135.4.4_0: Why shouldn’t I aspire to end the defilements?
ai-an5:135.4.5_0: I’m rarely ill or unwell. My stomach digests well, being neither too hot nor too cold, but just right, and fit for meditation.
ai-an5:135.4.6_0: Why shouldn’t I aspire to end the defilements?
ai-an5:135.4.7_0: I’m not devious or deceitful. I reveal myself honestly to the Teacher or sensible spiritual companions.
ai-an5:135.4.8_0: Why shouldn’t I aspire to end the defilements?
ai-an5:135.4.9_0: I live with energy roused up for giving up unskillful qualities and embracing skillful qualities. I’m strong, staunchly vigorous, not slacking off when it comes to developing skillful qualities.
ai-an5:135.4.10_0: Why shouldn’t I aspire to end the defilements?
ai-an5:135.4.11_0: I’m wise. I have the wisdom of arising and passing away which is noble, penetrative, and leads to the complete ending of suffering.
ai-an5:135.4.12_0: Why shouldn’t I aspire to end the defilements?’
ai-an5:135.4.13_0: A mendicant with these five qualities aspires to end the defilements.”
ai-an5:136.1.1_0: “Mendicants, an anointed aristocratic king’s eldest son with five factors aspires to become a viceroy.
ai-an5:136.1.3_0: It’s when an anointed aristocratic king’s eldest son is well born on both his mother’s and father’s side, of pure descent, irrefutable and impeccable in questions of ancestry back to the seventh paternal generation.
ai-an5:136.1.4_0: He is attractive, good-looking, lovely, of surpassing beauty.
ai-an5:136.1.5_0: He is dear and beloved to her parents.
ai-an5:136.1.6_0: He is dear and beloved to the armed forces.
ai-an5:136.1.7_0: He is astute, competent, and intelligent, able to think issues through as they bear upon the past, future, and present.
ai-an5:136.2.6_0: I’m dear and beloved to my parents.
ai-an5:136.2.8_0: dear and beloved to the armed forces ...
ai-an5:136.2.10_0: I’m astute, competent, and intelligent, able to think issues through as they bear upon the past, future, and present.
ai-an5:136.2.12_0: An anointed aristocratic king’s eldest son with these five factors aspires to become a viceroy.
ai-an5:136.3.1_0: In the same way, a mendicant with five qualities aspires to end the defilements.
ai-an5:136.3.3_0: It’s when a mendicant is ethical, restrained in the code of conduct, with good behavior and supporters. Seeing danger in the slightest fault, they keep the rules they’ve undertaken.
ai-an5:136.3.5_0: Their mind is firmly established in the four kinds of mindfulness meditation.
ai-an5:136.3.6_0: They live with energy roused up for giving up unskillful qualities and embracing skillful qualities. They’re strong, staunchly vigorous, not slacking off when it comes to developing skillful qualities.
ai-an5:136.3.7_0: They’re wise. They have the wisdom of arising and passing away which is noble, penetrative, and leads to the complete ending of suffering.
ai-an5:136.4.3_0: Why shouldn’t I aspire to end the defilements?
ai-an5:136.4.5_0: Why shouldn’t I aspire to end the defilements?

ai-an5:136.4.13_0: The sixth offering to an individual.
ai-an5:137.1.1_0: “Mendicants, these five sleep little at night, staying mostly awake.
ai-an5:137.1.3_0: A woman longing for a man.
ai-an5:137.1.4_0: A man longing for a woman.
ai-an5:137.1.5_0: A bandit remains thieves a search for little at night.
ai-an5:137.1.6_0: A king busy with his duties.
ai-an5:137.1.7_0: A mendicant longing for freedom from attachment.
ai-an5:137.1.8_0: These five sleep little at night, staying mostly awake.”
ai-an5:138.1.1_0: “Mendicants, a royal bull elephant with five factors eats food, takes up space, drops dung, and takes a ticket, yet is still considered to be a royal bull elephant.
ai-an5:138.1.3_0: It’s when a royal bull elephant can’t endure sights, sounds, smells, tastes, and touches.
ai-an5:138.1.4_0: A royal bull elephant with these five factors eats food, takes up space, drops dung, and takes a ticket, yet is still considered to be a royal bull elephant.
ai-an5:138.2.1_0: In the same way, a mendicant with five qualities eats food, takes up space, tramples beds and chairs, and takes a ticket, yet is still considered to be a mendicant.
ai-an5:138.2.3_0: It’s when a mendicant can’t endure sights, sounds, smells, tastes, and touches.
ai-an5:138.2.4_0: A mendicant with these five qualities eats food, takes up space, tramples beds and chairs, and takes a ticket, yet is still considered to be a mendicant.”
ai-an5:139.1.1_0: “Mendicants, a royal bull elephant with five factors is not worthy of a king, not fit to serve a king, and is not considered a factor of kingship.
ai-an5:139.1.3_0: It’s when a royal bull elephant can’t endure sights, sounds, smells, tastes, and touches.
ai-an5:139.2.1_0: And how is it that a royal bull elephant can’t endure sights?
ai-an5:139.2.2_0: It’s when a royal bull elephant gone to battle does not falter or founder at the sight of a division of elephants, of cavalry, of chariots, or of infantry. It stays firm, and plunges into battle.
ai-an5:139.2.3_0: That’s how a royal bull elephant can’t endure sights.
