ai-an5:238.2.8_0: A resident mendicant with these five qualities is raised up to heaven.”
ai-an5:239.1.1_0: “Mendicants, a resident mendicant with five qualities is cast down to hell.
ai-an5:239.1.7_0: And they waste a gift given in faith.
ai-an5:239.1.8_0: A resident mendicant with these five qualities is cast down to hell.
ai-an5:239.2.1_0: A resident mendicant with five qualities is raised up to heaven.
ai-an5:239.2.7_0: And they don’t waste a gift given in faith.
ai-an5:239.2.8_0: A resident mendicant with these five qualities is raised up to heaven.”
ai-an5:240.1.1_0: “Mendicants, a resident mendicant with five qualities is cast down to hell.
ai-an5:240.1.8_0: A resident mendicant with these five qualities is cast down to hell.
ai-an5:240.2.1_0: A resident mendicant with five qualities is raised up to heaven.
ai-an5:240.2.8_0: A resident mendicant with these five qualities is raised up to heaven.”
ai-an5:240.2.10_0: The fourth sub-chapter on probation is finished.
ai-an5:240.3.1_0: He enjoys the Religion and the seats.
ai-an5:240.3.2_0: and have been a great helper,
ai-an5:240.3.3_0: Three forms are deserved to be given away,
ai-an5:240.3.4_0: but two kinds of stingy, a stingy person.
ai-an5:241.1.1_0: “Mendicants, there are these five drawbacks of bad conduct.
ai-an5:241.1.4_0: After examination, sensible people criticize you.
ai-an5:241.1.6_0: They feel lost when they die.
ai-an5:241.1.7_0: And when their body breaks up, after death, they are reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell.
ai-an5:241.1.8_0: These are the five drawbacks of bad conduct.
ai-an5:241.2.1_0: There are these five benefits of good conduct.
ai-an5:241.2.4_0: After examination, sensible people praise you.
ai-an5:241.2.7_0: When their body breaks up, after death, they’re reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm.
ai-an5:241.2.8_0: These are the five benefits of good conduct.”
ai-an5:242.1.1_0: “Mendicants, there are these five drawbacks in bad bodily conduct ... benefits in good bodily conduct ...”
ai-an5:243.1.1_0: “Mendicants, there are these five drawbacks in bad verbal conduct ... benefits in good verbal conduct ...”
ai-an5:244.1.1_0: “Mendicants, there are these five drawbacks in bad mental conduct ... benefits in good mental conduct ...”
ai-an5:244.1.4_0: After examination, sensible people praise you.
ai-an5:244.1.7_0: When their body breaks up, after death, they’re reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm.
ai-an5:244.1.8_0: These are the five benefits of good conduct.”
ai-an5:245.1.1_0: “Mendicants, there are these five drawbacks of bad conduct.
ai-an5:245.1.4_0: After examination, sensible people criticize you.
ai-an5:245.1.6_0: You drift away from true teachings.
ai-an5:245.1.8_0: These are the five drawbacks of bad conduct.
ai-an5:245.2.1_0: There are these five benefits of good conduct.
ai-an5:245.2.4_0: After examination, sensible people praise you.
ai-an5:245.2.6_0: You drift away from untrue teachings.
ai-an5:245.2.8_0: These are the five benefits of good conduct.”
ai-an5:246.1.1_0: “Mendicants, there are these five drawbacks in bad bodily conduct ... benefits in good bodily conduct ...”
ai-an5:246.1.2_0: The sixth offering to an individual.
ai-an5:247.1.1_0: “Mendicants, there are these five drawbacks in bad verbal conduct ... benefits in good verbal conduct ...”
ai-an5:248.1.1_0: “Mendicants, there are these five drawbacks in bad mental conduct ... benefits in good mental conduct ...”
ai-an5:248.1.4_0: After examination, sensible people praise you.
ai-an5:248.1.6_0: You drift away from untrue teachings.
ai-an5:248.1.8_0: These are the five benefits of good conduct.”
ai-an5:249.1.1_0: “Mendicants, there are these five drawbacks of a charnel ground.
ai-an5:249.1.3_0: It’s filthy, stinking, frightening, a gathering place for savage monsters, and a weeping place for many people.
ai-an5:249.1.4_0: These are the five drawbacks of a charnel ground.
ai-an5:249.2.1_0: In the same way there are five drawbacks of a person like a charnel ground.
ai-an5:249.2.3_0: To start with, some person has filthy conduct by way of body, speech, and mind.
ai-an5:249.2.5_0: He has filthy conduct by way of mind.
ai-an5:249.2.6_0: This is how they’re filthy, I say.
ai-an5:249.2.7_0: That person is just as filthy as a charnel ground.
ai-an5:249.2.8_0: They’re like the person who mistakes branches and leaves for heartwood, I say.
ai-an5:249.3.1_0: Because of their filthy conduct, they get a bad reputation.
ai-an5:249.3.2_0: This is how they’re unintelligent, I say.
ai-an5:249.3.3_0: That person is like a charnel ground.
ai-an5:249.3.4_0: They’re like the person who mistakes branches and leaves for heartwood, I say.
ai-an5:249.4.1_0: Because of their filthy conduct, good-hearted spiritual companions avoid them from afar.
ai-an5:249.4.2_0: That’s how they’re frightening, I say.
ai-an5:249.4.3_0: That person is just as favourable to the weavers.
ai-an5:249.4.4_0: They’re like the person who mistakes branches and leaves for heartwood, I say.
ai-an5:249.5.1_0: Because of their filthy conduct, they live together with people of a similar character.
ai-an5:249.5.2_0: This is how they gather with savage monsters, I say.
ai-an5:249.5.3_0: That person is just as much a gathering place of savage monsters as a charnel ground.
ai-an5:249.5.4_0: They’re like the person who mistakes branches and leaves for heartwood, I say.
ai-an5:249.6.1_0: Because of their filthy conduct, when good-hearted spiritual companions see them they complain:
ai-an5:249.6.2_0: ‘Oh, it’s so painful for us to have to live together with such as these.’
ai-an5:249.6.3_0: This is how there’s weeping, I say.
ai-an5:249.6.4_0: That person is just as much a charnel ground.
ai-an5:249.6.5_0: They’re like the person who mistakes branches and leaves for heartwood, I say.
ai-an5:249.6.6_0: These are the five drawbacks of a person like a charnel ground.”
ai-an5:250.1.1_0: “Mendicants, there are these five drawbacks of placing faith in an individual.
ai-an5:250.1.3_0: The individual to whom a person is devoted falls into an offense such that the Saṅgha suspends them.
ai-an5:250.1.5_0: ‘This person dear and beloved to me has been suspended by the Saṅgha.’
ai-an5:250.1.6_0: They’re very suspicious about mendicants, whether senior, junior, or middle.
ai-an5:250.1.7_0: So they don’t frequent other mendicants,
ai-an5:250.1.8_0: they don’t hear the true teaching,
ai-an5:250.1.9_0: and they fall away from the true teaching.
ai-an5:250.1.10_0: This is the first drawback in placing faith in an individual.
ai-an5:250.2.1_0: Furthermore, the individual to whom a person is devoted falls into an offense such that the Saṅgha makes them sit at the end of the line. ...
ai-an5:250.2.3_0: ‘This person dear and beloved to me has been dear and beloved to the Saṅgha.’
ai-an5:250.2.4_0: They’re very suspicious about mendicants, whether senior, junior, or middle.
ai-an5:250.2.5_0: So they don’t frequent other mendicants,
ai-an5:250.2.6_0: they don’t hear the true teaching,
ai-an5:250.2.7_0: and they fall away from the true teaching.
ai-an5:250.2.8_0: This is the second drawback in placing faith in an individual.
ai-an5:250.3.1_0: Furthermore, the individual to whom a person is devoted departs for another region ...
ai-an5:250.3.3_0: ‘This person dear and beloved to me has passed away.’
ai-an5:250.3.4_0: So they don’t frequent other mendicants,
ai-an5:250.3.5_0: they don’t hear the true teaching,
ai-an5:250.3.6_0: and they fall away from the true teaching.
ai-an5:250.3.7_0: This is the fifth drawback in placing faith in an individual.
ai-an5:250.3.8_0: These are the five drawbacks of placing faith in an individual.”
ai-an5:250.3.10_0: The fifth sub-chapter on bad conduct is finished.
ai-an5:250.4.1_0: bad conduct by way of body,
ai-an5:250.4.2_0: by way of body, speech, and mind.
ai-an5:250.4.3_0: a charnel ground apart from four.
ai-an5:250.4.4_0: and inspires confidence in his heart:
ai-an5:251.1.1_0: “Mendicants, ordination should be given by a mendicant with five qualities.
ai-an5:251.1.3_0: It’s a mendicant who has the entire spectrum of an adept’s ethics,
ai-an5:251.1.5_0: endowed with the wisdom of an adept,
ai-an5:251.1.6_0: and freedom of one fully trained.
ai-an5:251.1.7_0: and knowledge and vision of freedom of one fully trained.
ai-an5:251.1.8_0: Ordination should be given by a mendicant with these five qualities.”
ai-an5:252.1.1_0: “Mendicants, dependence should be given by a mendicant with five qualities.
ai-an5:252.1.3_0: It’s when a mendicant has the entire spectrum of an adept’s ethics,
ai-an5:252.1.3_1: and knowledge and vision of freedom of one fully trained.
ai-an5:252.1.4_0: Any monk who gives formal support should be given to someone.”
ai-an5:253.1.1_0: “Mendicants, a novice should attend on a mendicant with five qualities.
ai-an5:253.1.3_0: It’s a mendicant who has the entire spectrum of an adept’s ethics,
ai-an5:253.1.3_2: the entire spectrum of an adept’s wisdom,
ai-an5:253.1.3_4: and knowledge and vision of freedom of one fully trained.
ai-an5:253.1.4_0: A novice should attend on a mendicant with these five qualities.”
ai-an5:254.1.1_0: “Mendicants, there are these five kinds of stinginess.
ai-an5:254.1.3_0: Stinginess with dwellings, families, material possessions, praise, and the teachings.
ai-an5:254.1.4_0: These are the five kinds of stinginess.
ai-an5:254.1.5_0: The most contemptible of these five kinds of stinginess is stinginess with the teachings.”
ai-an5:255.1.1_0: “Mendicants, the spiritual life is lived to give up and cut out these five kinds of stinginess.
ai-an5:255.1.3_0: Stinginess with dwellings, families, material possessions, praise, and the teachings.
ai-an5:255.1.4_3: The spiritual life is lived to give up and cut out these things.
ai-an5:255.1.5_0: The spiritual life is lived to give up and cut out these five kinds of stinginess.”
ai-an5:256.1.1_0: “Mendicants, without giving up these five qualities you can’t enter and remain in the first absorption.
ai-an5:256.1.3_0: Stinginess with dwellings, families, material possessions, praise, and the teachings.
ai-an5:256.1.4_0: Without giving up these five qualities you can’t enter and remain in the first absorption.
ai-an5:256.2.1_0: But after giving up these five qualities you can enter and remain in the first absorption.
ai-an5:256.2.3_0: Stinginess with dwellings, families, material possessions, praise, and the teachings.
ai-an5:256.2.4_0: After giving up these five qualities you can enter and remain in the first absorption.”
ai-an5:256.2.5_0: The sixth offering to an individual.
ai-an5:257-263.0.3_0: honoured by those likewise, honoured in the second, etc.,
ai-an5:257-263.1.1_0: “Mendicants, without giving up these five qualities you can’t enter and remain in the second absorption ...
ai-an5:257-263.1.3_0: Stinginess with dwellings, families, material possessions, praise, and the teachings.
ai-an5:257-263.1.4_0: Without giving up these five qualities you can’t realize perfection.
ai-an5:257-263.2.1_0: But after giving up these five qualities you can enter and remain in the second absorption ...
ai-an5:257-263.2.3_0: Stinginess with dwellings, families, material possessions, praise, and the teachings.
ai-an5:257-263.2.4_0: After giving up these five qualities you can realize perfection.”
ai-an5:264.1.1_0: “Mendicants, without giving up these five qualities you can’t enter and remain in the first absorption.
ai-an5:264.1.3_0: Stinginess with dwellings, families, material possessions, praise, and lack of gratitude and thankfulness.
ai-an5:264.1.4_0: Without giving up these five qualities you can’t enter and remain in the first absorption.
ai-an5:264.2.1_0: But after giving up these five qualities you can enter and remain in the first absorption.
ai-an5:264.2.3_0: Stinginess with dwellings, families, material possessions, praise, and lack of gratitude and thankfulness.
ai-an5:264.2.4_0: After giving up these five qualities you can enter and remain in the first absorption.”
ai-an5:265-271.0.3_0: get rid of requisites, and so on, namely glorious,
ai-an5:265-271.1.1_0: “Mendicants, without giving up these five qualities you can’t enter and remain in the second absorption ...
ai-an5:265-271.1.3_0: Stinginess with dwellings, families, material possessions, praise, and lack of gratitude and thankfulness.
ai-an5:265-271.1.4_0: Without giving up these five qualities you can’t realize perfection.
ai-an5:265-271.2.1_0: But after giving up these five qualities you can enter and remain in the second absorption ...
ai-an5:265-271.2.3_0: Stinginess with dwellings, families, material possessions, praise, and lack of gratitude and thankfulness.

ai-an5:272.1.1_0: “Mendicants, a person with five qualities should not be appointed as meal assigner.
